152.description: As introduced, authorizes grant payments under the grant assistance program for nursing home care to be made either monthly or quarterly. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 10; Title 11; Title 12; Title 13; Title 16; Title 17; Title 18; Title 29; Title 33; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 42; Title 43; Title 44; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 49; Title 50; Title 53; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 57; Title 58; Title 59; Title 60; Title 61; Title 62; Title 63; Title 64; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67; Title 68; Title 69; Title 70 and Title 71.

153.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee for 3/29/2023
153.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12, Chapter 3; Title 45; Title 50; Title 56, Chapter 1 and Title 67, relative to employee-owned businesses.
153.description: As introduced, enacts the "Employee Ownership, Empowerment, and Expansion Act," to support the growth and expansion of employee-owned businesses. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12, Chapter 3; Title 45; Title 50; Title 56, Chapter 1 and Title 67.

154.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee for 3/29/2023
154.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 140, Part 3, relative to ground ambulance service providers.
154.description: As introduced, requires an annual training pay bonus supplement for eligible emergency medical services personnel in the amount of $800. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 140, Part 3.

155.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
155.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, relative to taxation.
155.description: As introduced, allows a request for an extension of time to file a business tax return and pay the tax to be signed by the taxpayer or the taxpayer's representative. - Amends TCA Title 67.

156.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
156.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 7-52-606; Section 38-1-201; Section 39-17-1806; Section 50-6-904; Section 58-2-205; Section 58-2-204; Section 62-44-102 and Title 67, relative to business tax.
156.description: As introduced, eliminates the business tax for tax periods that begin on or after January 1, 2024. - Amends TCA Section 7-52-606; Section 38-1-201; Section 39-17-1806; Section 50-6-904; Section 58-2-205; Section 58-2-204; Section 62-44-102 and Title 67.

157.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
157.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to implicit bias training.
157.description: As introduced, prohibits a local education agency, public charter school, public institution of higher education, the state board of education, and the department of education from requiring an educator, employee of an LEA or charter school, faculty member, or employee of a public institution of higher education to complete or participate in implicit bias training; defines "implicit bias training"; prohibits adverse licensure and employment actions from being taken against such an individual for the individual's failure or refusal to participate in implicit bias training. - Amends TCA Title 49.

158.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17 and Title 49, relative to the possession of weapons on school property.
158.description: As introduced, exempts from the offense of possessing or carrying a weapon on school property the possession or carrying of a pocket knife by a nonstudent adult on election day if the knife remains concealed at all times while the adult is on school property for the sole purpose of voting in an election for which the school is the adult's designated polling place. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17 and Title 49.

159.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
159.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 3, Part 7, relative to server permits.
159.description: As introduced, makes changes to the requirements for applicants for server permits. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 3, Part 7.

160.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
160.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55; Title 62 and Title 68, relative to the scrap metal industry.
160.description: As introduced, extends, from 10 to 12 days, the time period a scrap metal dealer must request a hearing from the department of commerce and insurance after receiving a notification regarding a violation. - Amends TCA Title 55; Title 62 and Title 68.

161.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
161.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55; Title 62; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to manufactured homes.
161.description: As introduced, requires the department of transportation to submit a brief written summary to the transportation committee of the house of representatives and the transportation and safety committee of the senate no later than March 15 annually concerning placards issued to transporters of manufactured homes, including data on unsafe and erratic driving reported to the department using the telephone number that appears on the placards. - Amends TCA Title 55; Title 62; Title 67 and Title 68.

162.last_action: Engrossed; ready for transmission to Sen.
162.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, Chapter 1; Title 37, Chapter 5 and Title 68, Chapter 11, relative to children.
162.description: As introduced, revises the definition of abandonment for purposes of termination of parental rights to include circumstances where the parent or guardian fails to visit or support the child for a period of three consecutive months if the child is less than four years of age; requires the court to waive the six-month waiting period after the filing of an adoption petition if the child is less than four years of age and certain circumstances have been met. - Amends TCA Title 36, Chapter 1; Title 37, Chapter 5 and Title 68, Chapter 11.

164.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 39; Title 44 and Title 62, Chapter 7, Part 1, relative to service animals.
164.description: As introduced, authorizes an employee of a public accommodation to ask for certain information about a dog guide in training; specifies that an individual utilizing a service animal or training a service animal in training is liable for damages to the same extent that an individual whose pet causes damages to a public accommodation is; makes other related changes to service animals and service animals in training. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 39; Title 44 and Title 62, Chapter 7, Part 1.

165.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 33 and Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 8, relative to state employees performing military service.
165.description: As introduced, establishes that full-time state employees who are members of a reserve component of the armed forces of the United States, including the Tennessee army and air national guard, shall continue to accrue annual and sick leave the employee would ordinarily accrue during any period of absence from the employee's respective duties for military service. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 33 and Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 8.

166.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 62, Chapter 38, Part 2 and Title 62, Chapter 38, Part 3, relative to tattoo and body piercing paraphernalia.
166.description: As introduced, prohibits the sale or distribution of tattoo and body piercing paraphernalia to minors. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 62, Chapter 38, Part 2 and Title 62, Chapter 38, Part 3.

167.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
167.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 5 and Title 12, relative to county government.
167.description: As introduced, prohibits a county employee from serving on the county commission of the county for which the person is employed. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 5 and Title 12.

168.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
168.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 2, relative to voting rights.
168.description: As introduced, authorizes up to two members of an LLC that owns property in a city to vote in the city's elections if the city's charter provides nonresident property owners voting rights. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 2.

169.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 27 and Title 29, relative to civil justice.
169.description: As introduced, states that property owners should expect that a permit application will be judged on the law in effect at the time of application; declares that the general assembly rejects the pending ordinance doctrine, as described by the Tennessee supreme court in its May 14, 2007, opinion in the case of Harding Academy v. Metropolitan Government of Nashville and Davidson County, as contrary to the public policy interests of property owners in this state. - Amends TCA Title 27 and Title 29.

170.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
170.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47; Title 49; Title 66 and Title 68, relative to building safety.
170.description: As introduced, enacts the "Fuel Gas Detector Act"; requires the installation and maintenance of fuel gas detectors in rooms containing an appliance fueled by propane, natural gas, or any liquefied petroleum gas for certain residential buildings. - Amends TCA Title 47; Title 49; Title 66 and Title 68.

171.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4; Title 67 and Title 68, Chapter 7, relative to medical cannabis.
171.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Medical Cannabis Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4; Title 67 and Title 68, Chapter 7.

172.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
172.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to a public policy opinion poll.
172.description: As introduced, requires county election commissions to include three non-binding questions related to the legalization of marijuana on the November 2024 ballot; requires the secretary of state to compile the results of the public policy opinion poll and forward the results to the members of the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 2.

173.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 8-25-213, relative to the optional retirement program.
173.description: As introduced, allows a person returning to service on other than a full-time basis in a position covered by the optional retirement program for higher education institutions to take or continue taking distributions from the optional retirement program during the period of reemployment under certain conditions. - Amends TCA Section 8-25-213.

175.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Local Government Committee
175.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 66, Chapter 24, Part 1, relative to registration of writings.
175.description: As introduced, requires documents submitted to the county register for registration to be in Times New Roman font with a minimum 12-point font size. - Amends TCA Title 66, Chapter 24, Part 1.

177.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
177.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, relative to alcoholic beverages.
177.description: As introduced, authorizes Sevierville to obtain a license to sell alcohol and beer for consumption on premises designated by the city with the alcoholic beverage commission and local beer board. - Amends TCA Title 57.

178.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
178.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to the achievement school district.
178.description: As introduced, removes the commissioner's authority to directly operate, or contract for the management of, a school or any grade configuration within a school in the achievement school district (ASD), and to assign a school or any grade configuration within a school to the ASD, on or after July 1, 2024; removes all schools from the ASD by July 1, 2024; removes all authority of, and requirements established for, the ASD on July 1, 2024. - Amends TCA Title 49.

179.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 7, relative to electric vehicles.
179.description: As enacted, authorizes, to the extent required by federal law, a vehicle operated by an engine fueled by natural gas or powered primarily by means of electric battery power to exceed vehicle weight limits, up to a maximum gross vehicle weight of 82,000 pounds, under criteria similar to the exception provided for vehicles operated by an engine fueled primarily by natural gas. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 7.

180.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
180.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 50-3-109, relative to public improvements contracts.
180.description: As introduced, clarifies that local governmental entities are not prohibited from evaluating bids, proposals, and qualifications based on experience, certifications, expertise, and past performance as stated in the solicitation documents, or requiring employees of the contractor to submit to a criminal history check to ensure the employees are permitted to enter controlled spaces of the governmental entities, in contracts for improvements to real property, or in a bid, proposal, or agreement relating to an improvement of real property. - Amends TCA Section 50-3-109.

181.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 10, Part 1; Title 3, Chapter 6, Part 1 and Title 8, Chapter 17, Part 1, relative to the Tennessee ethics commission.
181.description: As enacted, changes the date by which the Tennessee ethics commission must report to the governor and general assembly on the administration and enforcement of laws within its jurisdiction; specifies the scope of the commission's jurisdiction; revises provisions governing the issuance of advisory opinions by the commission; requires certain entities to notify the commission of the primary person responsible for administering and enforcing the entity's ethical standards; changes updating requirements for the disclosure form; and clarifies which entity can issue formal advisory opinions. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 10, Part 1; Title 3, Chapter 6, Part 1 and Title 8, Chapter 17, Part 1.

182.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 10; Title 3, Chapter 6; Title 4, Chapter 55; Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 5 and Title 57, relative to campaign finance.
182.description: As introduced, designates "political campaign committees" and "multicandidate political campaign committees" as "political action committees"; makes various changes to campaign finance laws and the duties of the registry of election finance. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 10; Title 3, Chapter 6; Title 4, Chapter 55; Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 5 and Title 57.

183.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 55, relative to the bureau of ethics and campaign finance.
183.description: As enacted, requires assistant director and general counsel of the bureau of ethics and campaign finance, if any, to be employed upon the recommendation of the executive director and approval by the board of directors of the bureau; requires persons and entities required to register with the registry of election finance or the Tennessee ethics commission to provide an email address, or alternatively, a mailing address if no email address is available, for the purpose of serving notice upon the registrant. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 55.

184.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
184.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to health care.
184.description: As introduced, increases, from 10 to 15, the amount of days within which an applicant must send notice to the appropriate officials that an application for a nonresidential substitution-based treatment center for opiate addiction has been filed with the health facilities commission. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71.

185.last_action: Placed on cal. Insurance Committee for 3/28/2023
185.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to health insurance.
185.description: As introduced, requires the commissioner to make available to healthcare providers on the department's website the prescribed claims forms for reporting by healthcare providers. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71.

186.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
186.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 20, Chapter 1, Part 1 and Title 56, Chapter 7, Part 12, relative to civil actions.
186.description: As introduced, specifies that a defendant in a civil action where comparative fault is an issue includes an insurance company that issued an uninsured motor vehicle coverage policy and was served with process. - Amends TCA Title 20, Chapter 1, Part 1 and Title 56, Chapter 7, Part 12.

187.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
187.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 10; Title 33; Title 45; Title 47; Title 49; Title 50; Title 53; Title 55; Title 56; Title 62; Title 63; Title 65; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to insurance.
187.description: As introduced, removes a reference to a repealed provision of law that established an exception to the prohibition of managed health insurance issuers contacting or employing an agent to directly contact a patient of a physician's practice in an effort to change a referral for services to another provider if the managed health insurance issuer has contracted with the physician directly. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 10; Title 33; Title 45; Title 47; Title 49; Title 50; Title 53; Title 55; Title 56; Title 62; Title 63; Title 65; Title 68 and Title 71.

188.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 58 and Title 68, relative to the governor's emergency powers.
188.description: As introduced, repeals the authority of the governor to renew an executive order to address an emergency after 45 days; authorizes the governor to call the general assembly into an extraordinary session to address the emergency; if the general assembly fails to address the emergency, authorizes the governor to renew the executive order one year after the expiration of the original order or one year after the adjournment of session, whichever occurs later. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 58 and Title 68.

189.last_action: Action Def. in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee to 4/5/2023
189.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13, relative to firearms.
189.description: As introduced, adds a requirement that notice of the prohibition or restriction on the possession of weapons by an individual or entity must be posted no more than three feet from each entrance; requires the notice sign to measure at least 22 inches wide and 22 inches high, have a red background and white letters, and be mounted within a certain distance from the ground. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13.

191.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 39-17-1359, relative to firearms.
191.description: As introduced, exempts enhanced handgun carry permit holders from the prohibition against carrying a weapon on property that has been posted to prohibit possession of weapons on the premises; removes criminal penalty of Class B misdemeanor punishable only by $500 fine for carrying a weapon on posted property. - Amends TCA Section 39-17-1359.

192.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
192.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to convenience voting.
192.description: As introduced, deletes provisions authorizing the establishment of convenient voting centers. - Amends TCA Title 2.

193.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
193.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 68, Chapter 140, relative to the Tennessee emergency medical services board.
193.description: As introduced, requires the chair of the emergency medical services board to convene the board for meetings at least once each quarter rather than twice in one year. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 68, Chapter 140.

194.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 22, relative to the board for professional counselors, marital and family therapists, and clinical pastoral therapists.
194.description: As introduced, extends the board for professional counselors, marital and family therapists, and clinical pastoral therapists to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 22.

195.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 8, Chapter 30, relative to the board of appeals for the department of human resources.
195.description: As enacted, extends the board of appeals for the department of human resources to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 8, Chapter 30.

196.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 68, Chapter 122, relative to the board of boiler rules.
196.description: As enacted, extends the board of boiler rules to June 30, 2028. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 68, Chapter 122.

197.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 6, relative to the board of medical examiners.
197.description: As introduced, extends the board of medical examiners to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 6.

198.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 7, relative to the board of nursing.
198.description: As enacted, extends the board of nursing to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 7.

199.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 10, relative to the board of pharmacy.
199.description: As enacted, extends the board of pharmacy to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 10.

200.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, Chapter 7, Part 8, relative to the board of trustees of the college savings trust fund program.
200.description: As enacted, extends the board of trustees of the college savings trust fund program to June 30, 2029. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, Chapter 7, Part 8.

201.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 53, relative to the controlled substance database committee.
201.description: As enacted, extends the controlled substance database committee to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 53.

202.last_action: P2C, ref. to Government Operations Committee
202.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 4, Chapter 3 and Title 37, relative to the department of children's services.
202.description: As introduced, extends the department of children's services to June 30, 2024; requires the department to submit quarterly reports to the chairs of the government operations committees to provide updates on the department's progress in addressing performance audit findings; requires the department to appear before the education, health, and general welfare joint evaluation committee no later than June 30, 2023, to present information included in the department's six-month follow-up report submitted to the comptroller of the treasury. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 4, Chapter 3 and Title 37.

203.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3, relative to the department of commerce and insurance.
203.description: As introduced, extends the department of commerce and insurance to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3.

204.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3, relative to the department of environment and conservation.
204.description: As introduced, extends the department of environment and conservation to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3.

205.last_action: H. Placed on Consent Calendar for 3/27/2023
205.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 4, Chapter 3 and Title 63, relative to the department of health.
205.description: As introduced, extends the department of health to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 4, Chapter 3 and Title 63.

206.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3, relative to the department of human resources.
206.description: As introduced, extends the department of human resources to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3.

207.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3, relative to the department of intellectual and developmental disabilities.
207.description: As introduced, extends the department of intellectual and developmental disabilities to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3.

208.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3, relative to the department of safety.
208.description: As introduced, extends the department of safety to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3.

209.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 11, Chapter 25, relative to the Doe Mountain recreation authority.
209.description: As enacted, extends the Doe Mountain recreation authority to June 30, 2029. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 11, Chapter 25.

210.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 68, Chapter 121, relative to the elevator and amusement device safety board.
210.description: As enacted, extends the elevator and amusement device safety board to June 30, 2028. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 68, Chapter 121.

211.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 27 and Title 4, Chapter 29, relative to the employee suggestion award board.
211.description: As introduced, extends the employee suggestion award board to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 27 and Title 4, Chapter 29.

212.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, Chapter 17, relative to the energy efficient schools council.
212.description: As enacted, extends the energy efficient schools council to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, Chapter 17.

213.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 68, Chapter 7, relative to the medical cannabis commission.
213.description: As enacted, extends the medical cannabis commission to June 30, 2025. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 68, Chapter 7.

214.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 64, Chapter 9, relative to the Megasite Authority of West Tennessee.
214.description: As introduced, extends the Megasite Authority of West Tennessee to June 30, 2025. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 64, Chapter 9.

215.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 12, Chapter 4, Part 4, relative to the prevailing wage commission.
215.description: As enacted, extends the prevailing wage commission to June 30, 2028. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 12, Chapter 4, Part 4.

216.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 11, Part 4, relative to the professional art therapist advisory committee of the board of examiners in psychology.
216.description: As enacted, extends the professional art therapist advisory committee of the board of examiners in psychology to June 30, 2024. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 11, Part 4.

217.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 11, Part 5, relative to the Psychology Interjurisdictional Compact Act.
217.description: As enacted, extends the Psychology Interjurisdictional Compact Act to June 30, 2031. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 11, Part 5.

218.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 13, Part 3 and Title 4, Chapter 29, relative to the Sam Davis memorial association, board of trustees.
218.description: As enacted, extends the Sam Davis memorial association, board of trustees to June 30, 2029. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 13, Part 3 and Title 4, Chapter 29.

219.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 56, Chapter 32, relative to the selection panel for TennCare reviewers.
219.description: As introduced, extends the selection panel for TennCare reviewers to June 30, 2028. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 56, Chapter 32.

220.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 22, relative to the state textbook and instructional materials quality commission.
220.description: As introduced, extends the state textbook and instructional materials quality commission to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 22.

221.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 50, Chapter 7, relative to the state unemployment compensation advisory council.
221.description: As enacted, extends the state unemployment compensation advisory council to June 30, 2028. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 50, Chapter 7.

222.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 37, Chapter 5, Part 3, relative to the statewide community services agency.
222.description: As enacted, extends the statewide community services agency to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 37, Chapter 5, Part 3.

223.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 69, Chapter 3, relative to the Tennessee board of water quality, oil, and gas.
223.description: As enacted, extends the Tennessee board of water quality, oil, and gas to June 30, 2028. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 69, Chapter 3.

224.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 8, Chapter 34, relative to the Tennessee consolidated retirement system, board of trustees.
224.description: As enacted, extends the Tennessee consolidated retirement system, board of trustees to June 30, 2029. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 8, Chapter 34.

225.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 43, Chapter 29, relative to the Tennessee corn promotion board.
225.description: As enacted, extends the Tennessee corn promotion board to June 30, 2028. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 43, Chapter 29.

226.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 11, Chapter 7, relative to the Tennessee heritage conservation trust fund board of trustees.
226.description: As enacted, extends the Tennessee heritage conservation trust fund board of trustees to June 30, 2028. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 11, Chapter 7.

227.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 9, Chapter 4, Part 6, relative to the Tennessee interagency cash flow committee.
227.description: As enacted, extends the Tennessee interagency cash flow committee to June 30, 2029. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 9, Chapter 4, Part 6.

228.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 33, Chapter 11, relative to the Tennessee opioid abatement council.
228.description: As introduced, extends the Tennessee opioid abatement council to June 30, 2025. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 33, Chapter 11.

229.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, Chapter 13, relative to the Tennessee public charter school commission.
229.description: As introduced, extends the Tennessee public charter school commission to June 30, 2026. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, Chapter 13.

230.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 58, Chapter 7, relative to the Tennessee state veterans' homes board.
230.description: As introduced, extends the Tennessee state veterans' homes board to June 30, 2026; requires the board to report back to the education, health, and general welfare joint evaluation committee by December 31, 2023, to update the committee on its progress in addressing the findings set forth in the November 2022 performance audit report. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 58, Chapter 7.

231.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 68, Chapter 211, Part 1, relative to the underground storage tanks and solid waste disposal control board.
231.description: As introduced, extends the underground storage tanks and solid waste disposal control board to June 30, 2027; establishes minimum attendance requirement for board members and requires removal of members who do not meet the requirement. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 68, Chapter 211, Part 1.

232.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 65, Chapter 31, relative to the underground utility damage enforcement board.
232.description: As enacted, extends the underground utility damage enforcement board to June 30, 2028. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 65, Chapter 31.

233.last_action: P2C, ref. to Government Operations Committee
233.title: AN ACT relative to agency rules scheduled to expire pursuant to the provisions of the Uniform Administrative Procedures Act, compiled in Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 5.
233.description: As introduced, continues permanent rules filed with the secretary of state between January 1, 2022, and December 31, 2022, that are in effect on the effective date of this act until repealed or amended by subsequent rule of the appropriate rulemaking agency or until otherwise superseded by legislative enactment. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 5.

234.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
234.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, relative to oversight of governmental entities.
234.description: As introduced, reduces from 10 to five business days after a death, the time within which the commissioner must report the death of a person in custody to members of the general assembly representing the legislative districts where the deceased person resided; requires that the information contained in the report include the name of the department facility where the death occurred. - Amends TCA Title 4.

235.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
235.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 5, relative to the Uniform Administrative Procedures Act.
235.description: As introduced, requires each state agency head to complete periodic training for purposes of complying with the requirements of the "Regulatory Flexibility Act of 2007." - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 5.

237.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to students.
237.description: As introduced, requires an LEA that provides suspended students with remote instruction as part of an alternative school or alternative program to record the students as present for attendance purposes in the same manner as students attending regular classes. - Amends TCA Title 49.

238.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 1, Chapter 3 and Title 49, Chapter 2, Part 8, relative to statutory definitions.
238.description: As introduced, adds "sex" as a defined term for statutory construction purposes. - Amends TCA Title 1, Chapter 3 and Title 49, Chapter 2, Part 8.

239.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
239.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to victims of sexual offenses.
239.description: As introduced, requires a law enforcement agency to notify the victim of a sexual offense of the results of DNA data analysis on the victim's sexual assault evidence collection kit prior to releasing the results to the public; requires the department of mental health and substance abuse services or another appropriate provider to provide counseling to a victim of a sexually oriented crime at no charge to the victim. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

240.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to witnesses.
240.description: As introduced, creates the Tennessee witness protection and relocation grant pilot program to be administered by the attorney general and reporter. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41.

242.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
242.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 67-6-228 and Title 67, Chapter 6, Part 3, relative to taxation.
242.description: As introduced, exempts the retail sale of food and food ingredients from the sales tax if sold to a person who is 70 years of age or older during the period beginning July 1, 2023, and ending September 30, 2023. - Amends TCA Section 67-6-228 and Title 67, Chapter 6, Part 3.

243.last_action: Assigned to s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee
243.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 5, Part 7, relative to property tax relief.
243.description: As introduced, increases income eligibility limits for property tax relief for elderly low-income homeowners and disabled homeowners to $36,600; increases income eligibility limits for property tax relief for elderly low-income homeowners under the Property Tax Freeze Act to $36,600; increases the full market value limit on which property tax reimbursement is calculated for eligible elderly low-income homeowners and disabled homeowners to $35,000; and increases the full market value limit on which property tax reimbursement is calculated for disabled veteran and surviving spouse homeowners to $200,000. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 5, Part 7.

244.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 4, relative to license plates in the emergency category.
244.description: As introduced, authorizes issuance of a license plate in the emergency category to emergency communication dispatchers. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 4.

245.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
245.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 2, Part 1, relative to maintaining voter registration lists.
245.description: As introduced, requires reports of deaths in relation to maintaining voter registration lists to include the date of the death; requires the coordinator of elections to prepare a report for the general assembly regarding deaths of registered voters. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 2, Part 1.

246.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 7, relative to business tax.
246.description: As introduced, exempts services furnished by persons engaged in the appraisal of real estate or real property from business tax. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 7.

247.last_action: Placed on cal. Criminal Justice Committee for 3/28/2023
247.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to criminal offenses against persons.
247.description: As introduced, requires a person convicted of domestic assault involving strangulation to serve a mandatory minimum sentence of 30 days incarceration; states that a defendant who commits aggravated assault in which the victim of the offense loses consciousness due to strangulation may be prosecuted for attempted second degree murder. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

248.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
248.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 27, Chapter 5 and Title 29, Chapter 18, relative to appeals from general sessions courts.
248.description: As introduced, specifies that in general sessions court cases involving an order granting possession of real property, a writ of possession, or restitution may issue two days after the decision is rendered and execution of the writ must be delayed until expiration of the 10-day appellate period. - Amends TCA Title 27, Chapter 5 and Title 29, Chapter 18.

249.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
249.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to career readiness assessments.
249.description: As introduced, requires, beyond the 2022-2023 school year, each LEA and public charter school to provide each high school senior, instead of students generally, the opportunity to take nationally recognized assessments if the assessments meet certain criteria. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

250.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
250.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to special education.
250.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Special Educator Scholarship Act." - Amends TCA Title 49.

251.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
251.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6 and Title 68, relative to home school.
251.description: As introduced, removes the requirement that a parent-teacher of a home school student provide proof of the student's immunizations and receipt of health services or examinations required by law generally for children in this state to the local education agency; exempts home school students from the immunization requirements applicable to students attending a school, nursery school, kindergarten, preschool, or child care facility. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6 and Title 68.

252.last_action: Placed on cal. Criminal Justice Committee for 3/28/2023
252.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36 and Title 39, relative to parentage fraud.
252.description: As introduced, establishes the Class A misdemeanor of parentage fraud when a person fraudulently claims that the victim is the biological parent of a child or fraudulently seeks to be legally established as a child's parent based on the person's status as a biological parent of the child. - Amends TCA Title 36 and Title 39.

254.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
254.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to school meals.
254.description: As introduced, requires each local school board to establish a school lunch program and a school breakfast program that provides a free breakfast and lunch to each student enrolled in a school under the board's jurisdiction; requires the state to reimburse each LEA the cost of providing a free breakfast and lunch to each student enrolled in the LEA after all available federal funds have been applied. - Amends TCA Title 49.

255.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
255.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to sales and use tax exemptions.
255.description: As introduced, exempts the retail sale of food and food ingredients from the sales tax if sold during the period beginning August 1, 2023, and ending September 30, 2023. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 6.

256.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 21, Part 3, relative to the 2021 Precious Cargo Act.
256.description: As introduced, clarifies that an owner or lessee of a motor vehicle who is the parent, legal guardian, or conservator of a person who has an intellectual or developmental disability or medical condition, who may be operating the owner's or lessee's vehicle, and who needs assistance in communicating specific needs to law enforcement and first responders, may apply for a designation of such person's need in the Tennessee Vehicle Title and Registration System (VTRS) database. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 21, Part 3.

257.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 21, relative to student transportation.
257.description: As introduced, changes, from the state board of education to local boards of education, the entity responsible for requiring certain examinations of school bus drivers, for requiring certain reports, and for revoking the certificates of school bus drivers found to be unfit; expands the types of convictions for which a school bus driver's certificate must be revoked; revises various provisions to change, from the state board of education to the department of safety, the entity responsible for adopting specifications for school buses. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 21.

258.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
258.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 6, Part 1, relative to taxes.
258.description: As introduced, defines Sevierville as a premiere type tourist resort for purposes of sales tax distribution. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 6, Part 1.

261.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
261.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 16; Title 17 and Title 49, relative to partisan elections.
261.description: As introduced, requires state and local elections for public office to be partisan elections; requires judges who are required by this state's constitution to be reelected at retention elections to declare a bona fide membership with a political party or independent status at least 30 days prior to a retention election. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 16; Title 17 and Title 49.

262.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 14; Title 33; Title 37; Title 49; Title 50 and Title 68, relative to vaccines.
262.description: As introduced, prohibits a governmental entity, school, or local education agency from mandating that a person receive a vaccine that has not been fully approved by the federal food and drug administration and makes related changes. - Amends TCA Title 14; Title 33; Title 37; Title 49; Title 50 and Title 68.

263.last_action: Failed for lack of second in: Population Health Subcommittee
263.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 14; Title 36, Chapter 1, Part 1; Title 37; Title 49; Title 50 and Title 68, relative to immunizations.
263.description: As introduced, prohibits the state or a political subdivision of the state from requiring an immunization unless exemptions are provided for persons who file signed, written statements affirming that the immunization conflicts with their religious tenets and practices; makes certain other changes related to immunizations. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 14; Title 36, Chapter 1, Part 1; Title 37; Title 49; Title 50 and Title 68.

264.last_action: Failed in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
264.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 44; Title 53 and Title 70, relative to the importation of wildlife carcasses.
264.description: As introduced, prohibits the wildlife resource agency from prohibiting the importation into this state of a carcass if importation of the carcass is otherwise permitted under state and federal law. - Amends TCA Title 44; Title 53 and Title 70.

265.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
265.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 20; Title 33; Title 38; Title 39; Title 47; Title 49; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to drugs.
265.description: As introduced, removes the "within 10 days after January 1, 2015" factor from the requirement that each medical practitioner, unless the practitioner meets an exception, must ensure that the undispensed inventory of opioids and benzodiazepines purchased under the prescriber's drug enforcement administration number for dispensing is returned to a licensed third party reverse distributor or turned into local law enforcement. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 20; Title 33; Title 38; Title 39; Title 47; Title 49; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

266.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
266.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, relative to juvenile records.
266.description: As introduced, authorizes a juvenile court to order a child who has requested the expunction of the child's juvenile court records to undergo a mental health evaluation and use the evaluation results to assist in determining whether expunction would serve the best interest of the child and the community. - Amends TCA Title 37.

267.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
267.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 68, relative to services for certain victims of crime.
267.description: As introduced, requires a law enforcement agency to provide victims of crime with the contact information for crisis intervention services and emergency and medical services, in addition to the availability of any such services. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 68.

268.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to abortion.
268.description: As introduced, requires the department of health to publish on its website information on the possibility of reversing the effects of a chemical abortion in any language that is the primary language spoken by 1 percent or more of this state's population, rather than 2 percent or more. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 63 and Title 68.

269.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to student proficiency.
269.description: As introduced, allows a third grade student to be promoted, even if the student does not test proficient on the English language arts (ELA) portion of the student's most recent Tennessee comprehensive assessment program (TCAP) test, if the student tests proficient in reading on each Tennessee universal reading screener administered to the student in the student's third grade year; allows a student's LEA to file an appeal regarding the student's identification for retention based on the student's performance on the ELA portion of the student's most recent TCAP test. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 6.

270.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Health Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
270.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to health.
270.description: As introduced, removes a code provision that created a taskforce to study methods on how best to prevent cardiovascular disease, hypertension, and diabetes in this state, which ceased to exist on December 15, 2020. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

273.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee for 3/29/2023
273.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to election campaigns.
273.description: As introduced, requires candidates for elective office who are unaffiliated with a statewide political party to disclose their unaffiliated status on sample or informational ballots used for campaigning purposes. - Amends TCA Title 2.

274.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
274.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, relative to exchange programs for needles and hypodermic syringes.
274.description: As introduced, applies on a statewide basis, rather than only in Nashville, Chattanooga, Knoxville, and Memphis, the distance parameter for the prohibition on needle and hypodermic syringe exchange programs being operated within 1,000 feet of a school or public park; removes the distance parameter of 2,000 feet that presently applies on a statewide basis outside those four cities. - Amends TCA Title 68.

275.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
275.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 4, relative to financial aid.
275.description: As introduced, changes the amount of a minority teaching fellowship award for a recipient who is enrolled in a degree program leading to licensure as a teacher in an institution of higher education with an approved educator preparation program from $5,000 to the cost of tuition and fees at the respective institution. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 4.

276.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to sentencing.
276.description: As introduced, directs TACIR to conduct a study comparing the length of sentences imposed on individuals currently incarcerated with current sentencing guidelines, and identify any disparities between sentences imposed for similar offenses; requires TACIR to submit a report to members of the general assembly by January 1, 2025. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41.

277.last_action: Assigned to s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee
277.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 7-51-1802, relative to leave policies.
277.description: As introduced, removes the prohibition on a local government from requiring, as a condition of contracting with the local government, that employers establish a leave policy that is different than required by state law. - Amends TCA Section 7-51-1802.

278.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
278.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 29, relative to voting rights.
278.description: As introduced, allows certain persons deprived of the right of suffrage to apply for a voter registration card and have the right of suffrage provisionally restored if the person enters into a payment plan to become current on all child support obligations. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 29.

279.last_action: Placed on cal. Commerce Committee for 3/28/2023
279.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 82, Part 3 and Title 66, relative to utility districts.
279.description: As introduced, increases maximum per diem allowable for commissioners of utility district board in Morgan and Roane Counties, from $300 to $500 per board meeting. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 82, Part 3 and Title 66.

280.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
280.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 16, Chapter 18, Part 3 and Title 40, relative to expunction.
280.description: As introduced, specifies that municipal court has jurisdiction over the expunction of a person's conviction for a violation of a municipal ordinance from the public records; specifies conditions for such expunction. - Amends TCA Title 16, Chapter 18, Part 3 and Title 40.

281.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33; Title 58; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to the practice of pharmacy.
281.description: As introduced, authorizes as part of the practice of pharmacy the prescribing of dietary fluoride supplements, certain immunization agents, opioid antagonists, and certain other drugs and products; makes various other changes to pharmacy practice. - Amends TCA Title 33; Title 58; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

282.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, relative to disease control and prevention.
282.description: As introduced, requires a hospital to offer immunization for influenza disease prior to discharging a patient who is 50 years of age or older from the hospital between October 1 and March 1; requires a hospital to offer an inpatient who is 65 years of age or older an immunization for pneumococcal disease prior to discharging the patient from the hospital. - Amends TCA Title 68.

283.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
283.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5, Chapter 14; Title 6, Chapter 56, Part 3; Title 12, Chapter 3, Part 12; Title 49, Chapter 13; Title 49, Chapter 2, Part 2 and Title 54, relative to thresholds for competitive sealed bids.
283.description: As introduced, standardizes the thresholds for competitive sealed bids for counties, municipalities, utility districts, local education agencies, and other local governmental entities. - Amends TCA Title 5, Chapter 14; Title 6, Chapter 56, Part 3; Title 12, Chapter 3, Part 12; Title 49, Chapter 13; Title 49, Chapter 2, Part 2 and Title 54.

284.last_action: Failed in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
284.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 2, relative to cock fighting.
284.description: As introduced, raises from a Class A misdemeanor to a Class E felony certain animal cruelty offenses involving a cock; requires a fine of not less than $1,000 nor more than $2,500 for the offense of being a spectator at a cock fight. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 2.

285.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
285.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 104, relative to fireworks.
285.description: As introduced, permits the sale of fireworks in a municipality or county unless the municipality or county passes an ordinance or law prohibiting the sale of fireworks in the municipality or county. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 104.

286.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
286.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 29, Chapter 17; Title 29, Chapter 16 and Title 65, Chapter 27, relative to eminent domain.
286.description: As introduced, requires the commissioner of finance and administration to report the total amount of state funds paid to acquire property through eminent domain in the 2021-2022 year to the chairs of the finance, ways and means committees and the office of legislative budget analysis by January 1, 2024. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 29, Chapter 17; Title 29, Chapter 16 and Title 65, Chapter 27.

287.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
287.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 64, Chapter 1, Part 7, relative to the Tellico Reservoir Development Agency.
287.description: As introduced, increases the compensation for members of the board of directors of the Tellico Reservoir Development Agency to $300 per meeting and $225 for meetings of committees of the board; increases the threshold at which sealed bids are required for purchases and contracts. - Amends TCA Title 64, Chapter 1, Part 7.

288.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
288.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to imposition of the death penalty.
288.description: As introduced, requires a sentence of death to be carried out within 30 business days of the conclusion of any appeals or post-conviction relief, if the jury unanimously determines that certain circumstances are met. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

289.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38, Chapter 6, Part 1 and Title 40, relative to diversion.
289.description: As introduced, removes the requirement for a defendant to pay a fee of $100 to the Tennessee bureau of investigation upon the defendant's request for diversion. - Amends TCA Title 38, Chapter 6, Part 1 and Title 40.

290.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 54, Chapter 17 and Title 54, Chapter 21, relative to outdoor advertising.
290.description: As introduced, deletes the obsolete date on which the commissioner of transportation is required to begin promulgating and enforcing rules necessary to carry out the "Outdoor Advertising Control Act of 2020"; deletes restrictions on the matters to be governed by such rules. - Amends TCA Title 54, Chapter 17 and Title 54, Chapter 21.

291.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
291.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 29; Title 33; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to health.
291.description: As introduced, deletes provisions related to the infections taskforce that focused on strategies and recommendations for the prevention and control of antibiotic resistant infections, including MRSA, and reported aggregate data on incidence and trends for invasive MRSA in Tennessee to the general assembly from 2008-2010. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 29; Title 33; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

292.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
292.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 57-3-207, relative to wineries.
292.description: As introduced, increases from 50,000 to 60,000 gallons, the amount of wine for which wineries and farm wine producers pay taxes during a calendar year at their licensed facilities that determines if their satellite facilities have to obtain wine from a licensed wholesaler. - Amends TCA Section 57-3-207.

293.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to suicide prevention.
293.description: As introduced, expands the Save Tennessee Students Act to require public institutions of higher education that issue new student identification cards to students enrolled in the institution to include contact information for certain crisis and suicide prevention lifelines on the cards; requires the institutions to post the contact information for certain crisis and suicide prevention lifelines in a conspicuous place on each campus operated by the institution. - Amends TCA Title 49.

294.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 7, relative to a tax deduction for businesses through the voluntary installation of electric vehicle chargers.
294.description: As introduced, allows certain retail and other businesses a deduction from business taxes for the installation of electric vehicle chargers. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 7.

295.last_action: Placed on cal. Commerce Committee for 3/28/2023
295.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 120, Part 1, relative to inspectors.
295.description: As introduced, authorizes a person entering into employment as a municipal or county building, plumbing, mechanical, or electrical inspector with an exempt jurisdiction to perform field inspections as of the date of employment; requires such persons to obtain either a commercial or residential certification, or both, in their respective discipline within 12 months of the date of employment. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 120, Part 1.

296.last_action: Placed on cal. Finance, Ways, and Means Committee for 3/28/2023
296.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 70-4-107, relative to game and fish proclamations.
296.description: As introduced, deletes requirement that the Tennessee Fish and Wildlife Commission file proclamations establishing hunting and fishing seasons with the county clerks for the counties affected and instead requires such proclamations be made available on the Tennessee wildlife resources agency website. - Amends TCA Section 70-4-107.

298.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 53, relative to meat.
298.description: As introduced, prohibits the manufacture, sale, or delivery, holding, or offering for sale of any livestock carcass, part of any livestock carcass, or meat food product that contains a mRNA vaccine or vaccine material unless the product labeling contains a conspicuous notification of the presence of the mRNA vaccine or vaccine material in the product. - Amends TCA Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 53.

299.last_action: Action Def. in s/c Public Service Subcommittee to First Calendar of 2024
299.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 1-3-120; Title 5; Title 8, Chapter 44 and Title 10, Chapter 7, relative to public notices.
299.description: As introduced, authorizes county governments to publish required public notices on the county's website in lieu of publication in a newspaper of general circulation as long as such publication complies with all other requirements for publication, including the period for publication. - Amends TCA Section 1-3-120; Title 5; Title 8, Chapter 44 and Title 10, Chapter 7.

300.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
300.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 10; Title 32; Title 34; Title 38; Title 55 and Title 68, relative to transfers of human body parts or organs.
300.description: As introduced, increases from $1.00 to $2.00, the amount of the voluntary donation that a registrant must have the opportunity to make upon the registration or registration renewal of any motor vehicle in any county in which the county clerk participates in the program, for the purpose of promoting and supporting organ donation in the state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 10; Title 32; Title 34; Title 38; Title 55 and Title 68.

301.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Public Service Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
301.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 6, relative to lobbyists.
301.description: As introduced, requires a lobbyist to wear a badge displaying certain information while engaged in lobbying the general assembly; requires the Tennessee ethics commission to design and produce the badges and authorizes the commission to charge a lobbyist for the actual cost of producing the badge. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 6.

302.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
302.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to evidence of identification for voting.
302.description: As introduced, authorizes the use of an identification card issued by an accredited institution of higher education in this state for purposes of voter identification at a polling place; requires the secretary of state to conduct studies on such use and file reports regarding such use. - Amends TCA Title 2.

303.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
303.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 4; Title 67 and Title 71, relative to opioid overdoses.
303.description: As introduced, requires establishments that have gross sales of alcoholic beverages of more than $500,000 per calendar year, as a condition of receiving or renewing a liquor-by-the-drink license, to keep an opiate antagonist nasal spray in an easily accessible location on the premises. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 4; Title 67 and Title 71.

304.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Health Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
304.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 16; Title 33; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 41; Title 57; Title 62 and Title 71, relative to mental health.
304.description: As introduced, changes references for mental defect, mental defective, and mentally defective to mental health condition throughout the code. - Amends TCA Title 16; Title 33; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 41; Title 57; Title 62 and Title 71.

305.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
305.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 50, relative to private schools.
305.description: As introduced, authorizes a private school to create a policy to regulate a student's participation in the school's athletic activities or events based upon a student's biological sex. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 50.

306.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to workforce training programs.
306.description: As introduced, requires the board to develop and administer a two-year pilot program to award grants to students enrolled in an eligible program and to students pursuing a quality non-degree credential. - Amends TCA Title 49.

307.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 16; Title 36 and Title 37, relative to guardians ad litem.
307.description: As introduced, establishes an office of the guardian ad litem pilot project within the twenty-second judicial district to represent the best interest of children in dependency and neglect cases; requires the pilot project to be supervised by the secretary of state's office. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 16; Title 36 and Title 37.

308.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
308.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4, relative to marijuana.
308.description: As introduced, decriminalizes the possession of certain amounts of marijuana by making such possession a civil violation punishable by a $25 fine or community service; makes other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4.

309.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, relative to expunction of certain records.
309.description: As introduced, deletes the requirement that a person file a petition with the court in order to have the public records regarding a criminal offense expunged if certain qualifying events have occurred, including the charge against the person was dismissed or a no true bill was returned by a grand jury. - Amends TCA Title 40.

310.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12, relative to veterans.
310.description: As introduced, requires the state procurement commission to strive to ensure that at least 5 percent of procurement contracts are awarded to veteran-owned businesses. - Amends TCA Title 12.

311.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee for 3/29/2023
311.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, Chapter 1, Part 1, relative to parental rights proceedings.
311.description: As introduced, makes various changes in regard to maintaining and securing documents in certain parental rights proceedings and the grounds for termination of parental rights. - Amends TCA Title 36, Chapter 1, Part 1.

313.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 56-7-120 and Title 68, Chapter 11, Part 2, relative to billing of services.
313.description: As enacted, makes changes to the law regarding assignment of benefits to a healthcare provider; removes provisions of law relative to the collection of out-of-network charges by healthcare facilities. - Amends TCA Section 56-7-120 and Title 68, Chapter 11, Part 2.

315.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 45, relative to the regulation of money transmitters.
315.description: As introduced, enacts the "Money Transmission Modernization Act". - Amends TCA Title 45.

316.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Public Service Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
316.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 15, relative to Juneteenth.
316.description: As introduced, changes the designation of June 19, known as "Juneteenth," from a day of special observance to a legal holiday. - Amends TCA Title 15.

317.last_action: Placed on cal. Finance, Ways, and Means Committee for 3/28/2023
317.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, Chapter 1, Part 1 and Title 37, Chapter 2, Part 4, relative to children.
317.description: As introduced, requires that a list of services available from other state programs and agencies be included in all plans established by agencies for a child in foster care. - Amends TCA Title 36, Chapter 1, Part 1 and Title 37, Chapter 2, Part 4.

318.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 53, Part 3; Title 9, Chapter 23; Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 20 and Title 68, Chapter 212, Part 2, relative to brownfields.
318.description: As introduced, establishes a "brownfield redevelopment area fund" to be used by the department to administer a brownfield redevelopment area grant program; creates a franchise and excise tax credit equal to the remediation costs for a brownfield property for a qualified development project in a tier 3 or tier 4 enhancement county; makes other related revisions. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 53, Part 3; Title 9, Chapter 23; Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 20 and Title 68, Chapter 212, Part 2.

319.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 67-6-102, relative to industrial machinery.
319.description: As enacted, clarifies that machinery, equipment, and associated parts used by the department of general services or a contracted entity for the Megasite Authority of West Tennessee is included in the definition of "industrial machinery" for purposes of sales and use taxes. - Amends TCA Section 67-6-102.

320.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/27/2023
320.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29, Part 2; Section 12-2-112; Title 54 and Title 55, relative to transportation.
320.description: As introduced, reduces, from eight to five, the number of members appointed by the commissioner to the selection committee that evaluates and scores requests for proposal when selecting and awarding a construction manager/general contractor services contract. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29, Part 2; Section 12-2-112; Title 54 and Title 55.

321.last_action: Placed on cal. Government Operations Committee for 3/27/2023
321.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 10-7-504; Title 49, Chapter 6 and Title 62, Chapter 35, relative to school safety.
321.description: As introduced, requires the threat assessment team of each LEA to coordinate with state agencies providing services and technical assistance to local teams. - Amends TCA Section 10-7-504; Title 49, Chapter 6 and Title 62, Chapter 35.

323.last_action: Placed on cal. Finance, Ways, and Means Committee for 3/28/2023
323.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 27 and Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 8, relative to public employment benefits.
323.description: As introduced, authorizes the local government insurance committee to establish voluntary benefits, in addition to health plan benefits, for retired local government employees; requires retired local government employees to be drawing retirement benefits through TCRS in order to participate in the health benefits. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 27 and Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 8.

324.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
324.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 53-10-303; Section 63-1-164 and Chapter 1039 of the Public Acts of 2018, relative to opioid prescription limitations.
324.description: As introduced, permanently extends the present law, which is set to terminate on July 1, 2023, that establishes limitations on the prescription of opioids and authorizes the promulgation of rules related to the calculation of those limitations. - Amends TCA Section 53-10-303; Section 63-1-164 and Chapter 1039 of the Public Acts of 2018.

325.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-16-216, relative to virtual schools.
325.description: As introduced, extends the repeal date for the Virtual Public Schools Act from June 30, 2023, to June 30, 2027. - Amends TCA Section 49-16-216.

326.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
326.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 32, relative to the financial activities of the governor's office of faith-based and community initiatives.
326.description: As introduced, removes the requirement that the nonprofit partner of the governor's office of faith-based and community initiatives use its own revenues to cover the cost of the nonprofit partner's activities; removes the prohibition on a state employee benefitting from the nonprofit partner's activities; removes the statement of the general assembly's intent that the state not realize any increased cost as a result of the governor's office of faith-based and community initiatives. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 32.

327.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
327.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 9, relative to funds administered by state government entities.
327.description: As introduced, authorizes biennial reports from designated state agencies regarding federal financial assistance to be filed electronically with the general assembly, - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 9.

328.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee for 3/29/2023
328.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 2, Part 1 and Title 49, Chapter 3, Part 3, relative to wages.
328.description: As introduced, requires the commissioner of education to publish the annual state salary schedule on the department's website. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 2, Part 1 and Title 49, Chapter 3, Part 3.

329.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
329.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 37, relative to children.
329.description: As introduced, deletes provisions related to a report regarding the status of the development of a plan for a statewide system of care for children's mental health due by February 1, 2009, and plans regarding implementation of the system of children's mental health care statewide due by July 1, 2010, and July 1, 2012, all of which were submitted by the council on children's mental health care to the governor, the judiciary, education, and health and welfare committees of the senate and the civil justice, education, and health committees of the house of representatives. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 37.

330.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
330.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 50, Part 10, relative to salaries paid at state special schools.
