501.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 40, relative to expunction.
501.description: As introduced, adds the offense of illegal registration or voting to those Class D felony offenses that are eligible for expunction. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 40.

502.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
502.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, relative to state symbols.
502.description: As introduced, expresses the intent of the general assembly that the state museum, as much as is practicable, collect and display an example or representation of each official state symbol. - Amends TCA Title 4.

503.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 17, relative to taxation.
503.description: As introduced, phases out professional privilege tax over four-year period for tax years that begin on and after June 1, 2024; reduces tax by $100 per year over such period. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 17.

506.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9; Title 54 and Title 67, relative to over-collections.
506.description: As introduced, requires 10 percent of tax revenue over-collections from the prior fiscal year to be deposited into the infrastructure and building fund reserve account in the general fund; authorizes appropriations from the infrastructure and building fund account only for capital improvement and infrastructure projects. - Amends TCA Title 9; Title 54 and Title 67.

507.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33, relative to mental health treatment.
507.description: As introduced, allows courts to order a person into a program of assisted outpatient mental health treatment upon finding certain conditions are met; provides a process for certain persons to petition a court on behalf of a proposed patient; establishes criteria for the evaluation of proposed patients and reporting to the court by physicians and certain mental health professionals. - Amends TCA Title 33.

509.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 11, Part 6, relative to justifications excluding criminal responsibility.
509.description: As introduced, justifies, under certain circumstances, the use of deadly force against another to prevent or terminate the other from committing or attempting to commit certain property offenses; specifies that the display or brandishing of a weapon does not constitute deadly force. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 11, Part 6.

510.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
510.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 16; Title 17; Title 18; Title 19; Title 20; Title 21; Title 25; Title 37 and Title 40, relative to court procedures.
510.description: As introduced, authorizes clerks to assess a transaction fee for electronic filing submitted by a party to a case in any court where electronic filing, signing, or verification of papers has been authorized by local court rule, and also approved by the supreme court, and is in compliance with technological standards established by the supreme court. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 16; Title 17; Title 18; Title 19; Title 20; Title 21; Title 25; Title 37 and Title 40.

511.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 45-2-907, relative to safe deposit boxes.
511.description: As enacted, extends, from May 1 to November 1, the due date of the report delivered by a lessor of a safe deposit box to the state treasurer containing the name and address of the lessee and an inventory of the contents of the box; extends, from May 1 to November 1, the deadline by which contents of an abandoned safe deposit box may be claimed before the lessor is required to sell the contents. - Amends TCA Section 45-2-907.

512.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
512.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 43; Title 50; Title 53; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to cannabis.
512.description: As introduced, changes from January 1 to January 15 the date by which the medical cannabis commission must submit its annual findings and recommendations to the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 43; Title 50; Title 53; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68.

513.last_action: Placed on cal. Criminal Justice Committee for 3/28/2023
513.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 43; Title 50; Title 56; Title 63; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to medical cannabis.
513.description: As introduced, changes the date, from January 1 to January 15, by which the medical cannabis commission must submit its annual findings and recommendations to the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 43; Title 50; Title 56; Title 63; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71.

514.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
514.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to insurance.
514.description: As introduced, removes a provision that required the commissioner to, by March 1, 2012, conduct a study of Tennessee's insurance laws and report the results to the governor and to the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

515.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
515.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5; Title 49 and Title 62, Chapter 35, relative to school safety.
515.description: As introduced, requires each school to make available to the department, instead of upon request by the department, the results of the school safety team's annual armed intruder drill, conducted in coordination with the local law enforcement agency. - Amends TCA Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5; Title 49 and Title 62, Chapter 35.

516.last_action: Assigned to s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee
516.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 211, relative to solid waste disposal.
516.description: As introduced, requires the department of environment and conservation to supervise the operation and maintenance of solid waste processing and disposal facilities in this state; authorizes a solid waste board to adopt and enforce rules governing the operation and maintenance of a solid waste processing or disposal facility; specifies certain penalties for a violation of the Solid Waste Management Act of 1991; makes other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 211.

517.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
517.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to medical education.
517.description: As introduced, requires the University of Tennessee and East Tennessee State University to annually submit a report to the education and health committees of the general assembly that includes the number of students who graduated from the respective institution in the previous year to become practitioners in the fields of primary care medicine or family practice medicine. - Amends TCA Title 49; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

518.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Higher Education Subcommittee of Education Administration
518.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 4, Part 9, relative to financial aid.
518.description: As introduced, adds William R. Moore College of Technology as an eligible institution for receipt of the Wilder-Naifeh reconnect grant and Wilder-Naifeh technical skills grant. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 4, Part 9.

519.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Calendar & Rules Committee
519.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6; Title 49, Chapter 7 and Title 49, Chapter 8, relative to water safety.
519.description: As introduced, requires local education agencies and public institutions of higher education to provide information to students and parents on the importance of water safety courses and to inform them of age appropriate water safety courses available in their area each school year. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6; Title 49, Chapter 7 and Title 49, Chapter 8.

520.last_action: Placed on cal. Government Operations Committee for 3/27/2023
520.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 63, Chapter 11, relative to music therapy.
520.description: As introduced, creates the professional music therapist advisory committee of the board of examiners in psychology to regulate the practice of music therapy. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 63, Chapter 11.

522.last_action: Placed on cal. Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee for 3/29/2023
522.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 69, Chapter 3, Part 1, relative to water quality.
522.description: As introduced, decreases from 30 to 20, the amount of days within which a polluter or violator must make an appeal following notification of an assessment of liability for damages to the state. - Amends TCA Title 69, Chapter 3, Part 1.

525.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
525.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 65; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to utilities.
525.description: As introduced, removes requirement for receipt of certain grants and loans for water and wastewater treatment infrastructure projects that a municipality includes depreciation in its calculation of fees or rates. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 65; Title 67 and Title 68.

526.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
526.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to assessments.
526.description: As introduced, requires the department to annually release the Tennessee comprehensive assessment program and end-of-course assessment blueprints and scoring methodology to the education committees of the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 49.

528.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
528.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 5, relative to educator licensure.
528.description: As introduced, revises various provisions regarding the automatic revocation of educator licenses. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 5.

529.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68 and Title 71, relative to TennCare.
529.description: As introduced, requires the bureau to reimburse air-based ambulance service providers, along with ground-based ambulance service providers, at a rate of no less than 67.5 percent of the federal medicare program's allowable charge for participating providers. - Amends TCA Title 68 and Title 71.

530.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
530.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, relative to creditable service in the Tennessee consolidated retirement system.
530.description: As introduced, allows TCRS members to establish retirement credit for military service in active federal duty in the armed forces of the United States under certain circumstances. - Amends TCA Title 8.

531.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
531.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 3, Chapter 6 and Title 8, relative to lobbying.
531.description: As introduced, reduces from 45 to 30 days the period following the conclusion of the biannual reporting periods by which an employer of a lobbyist must file with the Tennessee ethics commission the employer's disclosure report of compensation paid to each lobbyist employed by the employer. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 3, Chapter 6 and Title 8.

532.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
532.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 49, Chapter 7; Title 49, Chapter 8; Title 49, Chapter 9 and Title 49, Chapter 4, relative to higher education.
532.description: As introduced, delays the annual reporting date, from February 1 to February 15, that each governing board of a public institution of higher education must report to the office of legislative budget analysis with information regarding expenditures of revenues derived from tuition or fee increases in the previous full academic year. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 49, Chapter 7; Title 49, Chapter 8; Title 49, Chapter 9 and Title 49, Chapter 4.

533.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
533.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to student retention.
533.description: As introduced, allows a student who did not test proficient in English language arts (ELA) on the Tennessee comprehensive assessment program test administered to the student in third grade, but who was promoted to fourth grade after attending a learning loss bridge camp, to be promoted to fifth grade if the student's parent or guardian mutually agrees with the LEA or public charter school in which the student is enrolled that the student has shown adequate growth in ELA based on the student's grades or performance on assessments administered to the student in fourth grade. - Amends TCA Title 49.

534.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to restitution.
534.description: As introduced, allows the surviving parent or guardian of a child whose parent was a victim of vehicular homicide to convert a restitution order for child maintenance payments to a civil judgment at any time rather than following conclusion of the defendant's sentence. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55.

535.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 69, Chapter 9, Part 2 and Title 70, Chapter 1, Part 2, relative to the regulation of vessels.
535.description: As introduced, adds to qualifications for appointment to the commission that commissioners be well informed on boating operation, regulation, and safety. - Amends TCA Title 69, Chapter 9, Part 2 and Title 70, Chapter 1, Part 2.

536.last_action: Placed on cal. Finance, Ways, and Means Committee for 3/28/2023
536.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 70, Chapter 1, Part 5, relative to the lifetime sportsman endowment fund.
536.description: As introduced, deletes the requirement that proceeds from the sale of lifetime sportsman licenses be deposited into the lifetime sportsman endowment fund. - Amends TCA Title 70, Chapter 1, Part 5.

537.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
537.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 4, relative to voter registration.
537.description: As introduced, requires department of safety to automatically register a qualified person to vote from information on an application for a driver license or photo identification card unless the person opts out. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 4.

538.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
538.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 1 and Title 38, Chapter 8, relative to the questioning of juveniles.
538.description: As introduced, requires that an interview or interrogation of a child taken into custody for a delinquent act must be recorded or conducted in the presence of an attorney who represents the child. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 1 and Title 38, Chapter 8.

539.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 5, relative to youth development centers.
539.description: As introduced, names the educational facility located on the campus of the John S. Wilder youth development center "The Barbara Ward Cooper Education Center." - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 5.

540.last_action: Assigned to s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee
540.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 9, Chapter 8; Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 16; Title 18; Title 20; Title 21; Title 27; Title 28; Title 29; Title 50, Chapter 6 and Title 66, relative to court records in civil actions.
540.description: As introduced, authorizes a party to civil litigation to petition the court for removal and destruction of records under certain circumstances. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 9, Chapter 8; Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 16; Title 18; Title 20; Title 21; Title 27; Title 28; Title 29; Title 50, Chapter 6 and Title 66.

541.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 9, Chapter 8; Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 16; Title 18; Title 20; Title 21; Title 27; Title 28; Title 29; Title 45; Title 47; Title 50, Chapter 6 and Title 66, relative to credit data.
541.description: As introduced, prohibits consumer reporting agencies from including on a consumer report a record of a civil action that is filed in this state. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 9, Chapter 8; Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 16; Title 18; Title 20; Title 21; Title 27; Title 28; Title 29; Title 45; Title 47; Title 50, Chapter 6 and Title 66.

542.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to voter registration.
542.description: As introduced, requires each county election commission to post monthly on the commission's website a listing of all purged registrations from the previous month. - Amends TCA Title 2.

543.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 55, Chapter 12 and Title 55, Chapter 50, relative to motor vehicle financial responsibility for foster youth.
543.description: As introduced, creates the insuring foster youth fund; establishes the insuring foster youth program that authorizes payments to foster youth to defray the costs of obtaining motor vehicle insurance, driver education courses, and driver testing fees. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 55, Chapter 12 and Title 55, Chapter 50.

544.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 50, relative to digital state identification.
544.description: As introduced, requires the department to conduct a study and make recommendations regarding a secure digital license system. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 50.

546.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Public Service Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
546.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 8; Title 16 and Title 50, relative to leave for state employees.
546.description: As introduced, creates a program for paid family medical leave for state employees. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 8; Title 16 and Title 50.

547.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
547.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 1 and Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 7, relative to criminal instruments.
547.description: As introduced, creates a Class A misdemeanor offense for the possession of a device, tool, machine, implement, or other item capable of programming a smart key or key fob with the intent to use it or allow it to be used to commit theft. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 1 and Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 7.

548.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
548.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 5; Title 49, Chapter 7; Title 49, Chapter 8 and Title 49, Chapter 9, relative to public institutions of higher education.
548.description: As introduced, exempts a governing board of a public institution of higher education from the requirement to promulgate rules to establish traffic and parking regulations. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 5; Title 49, Chapter 7; Title 49, Chapter 8 and Title 49, Chapter 9.

549.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to solid waste.
549.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Waste Reduction and Recycling Act"; requires sellers, distributors, and importers of certain packaging materials to take certain actions to reduce the amount of packaging material that becomes litter. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 67 and Title 68.

551.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/27/2023
551.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36 and Title 37, relative to the department of children's services.
551.description: As introduced, states that the goal of the department must be to act in the best interest of the child at all times and that goal must be reflected in any mission statement or motto established by the department. - Amends TCA Title 36 and Title 37.

553.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
553.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 7; Title 16, Chapter 2 and Title 38, Chapter 6, relative to crimes against children.
553.description: As introduced, requires district attorneys general to designate one assistant district attorney general as the lead prosecutor in cases involving crimes committed against children; requires the Tennessee bureau of investigation to provide annual training to assistant district attorneys designated as lead prosecutors in crimes committed against children. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 7; Title 16, Chapter 2 and Title 38, Chapter 6.

554.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
554.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9, Chapter 8 and Title 29, Chapter 13, relative to victims of human trafficking.
554.description: As introduced, removes, for victims of human trafficking offenses, the requirement that the claimant prove that the victim or a member of the victim's family reported the offense to the proper law enforcement authorities within a certain period of time in order to be entitled to compensation from the criminal injuries compensation fund; adds victims of human trafficking offenses to those victims allowed to receive compensation from the criminal injuries compensation fund for personal injury or loss incurred as a result of pain and suffering. - Amends TCA Title 9, Chapter 8 and Title 29, Chapter 13.

555.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 15, Part 5, relative to crimes against elderly and vulnerable adults.
555.description: As introduced, requires that court clerks notify the health facilities commission, instead of the department of health, when an offender is to be placed on the registry of persons who have been determined to have abused, neglected, misappropriated, or exploited the property of vulnerable individuals; requires that such notice is given within 90 days of conviction of the offense. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 15, Part 5.

556.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 24, Chapter 7 and Title 37, relative to child forensic interviews.
556.description: As introduced, expands the admissibility of a forensic interview to include statements made by a child under 18 years of age rather than under 13 years of age; expands admissible forensic interviews from statements made by a child describing sexual contact performed with or on the child by another to statements describing sexual, abusive, or violent contact performed with or on the child by another or performed by a person with or on another and witnessed by the child; makes other changes relevant to forensic interviews. - Amends TCA Title 24, Chapter 7 and Title 37.

557.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
557.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to student attendance.
557.description: As introduced, requires an LEA or public charter school to allow a student to be absent from school for one full school day each year to allow the student time to address the student's mental or behavioral health. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

558.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to education savings accounts.
558.description: As introduced, expands student eligibility for an education savings account (ESA) to include students who were not enrolled, and who did not attend, a Tennessee public school for the one full school year immediately preceding the school year for which the student receives an ESA, but who were enrolled in, and who attended, a Tennessee public school in the 2019-2020, 2020-2021, or 2021-2022 school year, and to include students who are not eligible, for the first time, to enroll in a Tennessee school, but who were eligible, for the first time, to enroll in a Tennessee school in the 2019-2020, 2020-2021, or 2021-2022 school year. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

559.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, relative to compensation for the diminution in value of private property.
559.description: As introduced, provides a method for a property owner to seek just compensation for a diminution in value of the property caused by the enactment or enforcement of land use regulations on the property. - Amends TCA Title 29.

560.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
560.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to municipal elections.
560.description: As introduced, specifies that municipal elections can be partisan or nonpartisan. - Amends TCA Title 2.

561.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
561.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 58, Chapter 1, relative to military pay.
561.description: As introduced, requires the compensation for members of the national guard under active duty orders to begin immediately upon being activated; authorizes the department of human resources to prorate the compensation of the members as needed. - Amends TCA Title 58, Chapter 1.

562.last_action: Placed on cal. Civil Justice Committee for 3/29/2023
562.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, Chapter 3, relative to marriage.
562.description: As introduced, creates a class C misdemeanor for certain local public officers who charge a fee or demand compensation for solemnizing a marriage. - Amends TCA Title 36, Chapter 3.

563.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
563.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to solid waste.
563.description: As introduced, expands the maximum number of persons who may serve on a county solid waste authority's board of directors, from 15 to 17 members. - Amends TCA Title 55; Title 67 and Title 68.

564.last_action: Assigned to s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee
564.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 48 and Title 67, relative to real property taxes.
564.description: As introduced, requires a local governmental entity to hold a referendum to approve a property tax increase that exceeds specified thresholds. - Amends TCA Title 48 and Title 67.

565.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Health Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
565.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 33; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to measures to prevent overdose deaths.
565.description: As introduced, enacts the "Overdose Fatality Review Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 33; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

566.last_action: Placed on cal. Insurance Committee for 3/28/2023
566.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 71, relative to maternal health services.
566.description: As introduced, requires TennCare to create and implement a three-year pilot program to provide remote maternal health services to eligible TennCare recipients; authorizes the TennCare director to seek a federal waiver as necessary to implement the pilot program. - Amends TCA Title 71.

567.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
567.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 39; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to maternal health.
567.description: As introduced, requires the annual report by each nurse home visitor program to be submitted to the department of health, in addition to the health care and services facility administering the program and the community in which the program is administered. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 39; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

568.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to education options.
568.description: As introduced, extends the amount of time, from within 10 days to within 30 days, from the order making the assignment, within which a parent who is dissatisfied with the assignment of the parent's student may make a written application to the board for a hearing before the board as to the reasonableness of the assignment and ask for a transfer to another school. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

569.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
569.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 28-3-116, relative to abuse against children.
569.description: As introduced, allows civil actions for an injury or illness based on child sexual abuse occurring on or after a certain date to be brought at any time. - Amends TCA Section 28-3-116.

570.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Higher Education Subcommittee of Education Administration
570.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9; Title 12; Title 49 and Title 63, relative to limiting the application of DEI training.
570.description: As introduced, prohibits public institutions of higher education offering certain medical and health-related degree or certificate programs, and state contractors, from requiring diversity, equity, and inclusion training and education for purposes of the issuance of a degree, or the approval of a state contract or grant, as applicable. - Amends TCA Title 9; Title 12; Title 49 and Title 63.

571.last_action: Placed on cal. Finance, Ways, and Means Committee for 3/28/2023
571.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 66-29-142, relative to the timeframe for selling securities.
571.description: As introduced, permits the state treasurer to sell a security immediately after the treasurer takes custody of the security if the records of the holder do not reflect the identity of the person entitled to the security; makes other related revisions. - Amends TCA Section 66-29-142.

572.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
572.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 71, Chapter 3, relative to child care.
572.description: As introduced, increases from five to seven the minimum number of children a facility must have under its care for three or more hours per day in order to fall within the definition of a child care agency for licensing purposes. - Amends TCA Title 71, Chapter 3.

573.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
573.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 2-2-102 and Title 40, Chapter 29, relative to voting rights.
573.description: As introduced, restores the voting rights of persons convicted of certain infamous crimes upon receipt of a pardon or completion of any sentence of incarceration, parole, or probation. - Amends TCA Section 2-2-102 and Title 40, Chapter 29.

574.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Calendar & Rules Committee
574.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, relative to maternal mental health.
574.description: As introduced, requires the board of medical examiners to consider including a course in maternal mental health when establishing continuing medical educational requirements for persons licensed to practice medicine. - Amends TCA Title 63.

575.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to doula services.
575.description: As introduced, requires the bureau to establish a pilot program during the 2024-2025 fiscal year to provide payment for doula care services for pregnant women enrolled in the TennCare program who meet certain criteria; authorizes the director to seek a federal waiver to implement the pilot program. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 68 and Title 71.

576.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
576.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to sentencing of criminal offenders.
576.description: As introduced, adds as a factor the court may consider for the purpose of enhancing a defendant's sentence upon conviction of a criminal offense, consideration of whether the defendant committed the offense of aggravated assault or attempted first degree murder on grounds or premises defined as a healthcare facility. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

577.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13, relative to enhanced handgun carry permits.
577.description: As introduced, eliminates the application and processing fee for an enhanced handgun carry permit. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13.

578.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
578.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 29; Title 39; Title 58 and Title 63, relative to emergency responses.
578.description: As introduced, requires emergency communications districts (ECDs) to utilize the direct dispatch method in response to emergency 911 calls and one of three methods in response to non-emergency calls; requires that all emergency 911 calls, with the exception of misrouted calls, be dispatched without being transferred; authorizes ECDs to transfer non-emergency calls at the discretion of the dispatcher via attended transfer; adds emergency call takers and public safety dispatchers and emergency services personnel to definition of first responder for certain purposes. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 29; Title 39; Title 58 and Title 63.

580.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
580.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 4, relative to alcoholic beverages.
580.description: As introduced, deletes the definition of "premises" authorizing the sale of alcoholic beverages for on-premises consumption within the Station Street entertainment district in Chattanooga. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 4.

583.last_action: Action def. in Calendar & Rules Committee to 3/30/2023
583.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63 and Title 68, Chapter 11, relative to the employment of medical professionals.
583.description: As introduced, authorizes a hospital or an affiliated entity of the hospital to employ an emergency physician to treat patients at a satellite emergency department, or a physician to treat patients at a primary care clinic or urgent care clinic, which are located in this state if the hospital is located in a neighboring state in a county contiguous to this state and holds a valid certificate of need for a satellite emergency department in this state, and other conditions are satisfied. - Amends TCA Title 63 and Title 68, Chapter 11.

585.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 17, relative to the professional privilege tax.
585.description: As introduced, eliminates the professional privilege tax for attorneys. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 17.

586.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13; Title 55, Chapter 10, Part 4 and Title 69, Chapter 9, Part 2, relative to driving under the influence.
586.description: As introduced, lowers the threshold for enhancing the minimum sentence of a person convicted of driving under the influence of an intoxicant, from a blood alcohol concentration of 0.20 percent or more to a blood alcohol concentration of 0.15 percent or more. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13; Title 55, Chapter 10, Part 4 and Title 69, Chapter 9, Part 2.

587.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to student discipline.
587.description: As introduced, specifies that an LEA that has established a virtual school to enter into an agreement with an LEA that has not established a virtual school for the LEA's virtual school to provide remote instruction to students enrolled in either LEA who have been suspended or expelled from the regular school program. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

588.last_action: Placed on cal. Civil Justice Committee for 3/29/2023
588.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10 and Title 37, relative to department of children's services records.
588.description: As introduced, adds district attorneys general to those the department must release confidential information to upon presentation of an appropriate court order. - Amends TCA Title 10 and Title 37.

589.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 15; Title 16; Title 36; Title 37; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to children.
589.description: As introduced, changes from March 1 to March 15, the date by which the department must make a presentation to the appropriate committees of the senate and the house of representatives on the comprehensive annual report of the status of child care agencies within the state subject to the department's jurisdiction. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 15; Title 16; Title 36; Title 37; Title 68 and Title 71.

590.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
590.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 62, Chapter 32, relative to alarm systems.
590.description: As introduced, deletes the Alarm Contractors Licensing Act of 1991; authorizes counties and municipalities to offer alarm system monitoring under certain circumstances. - Amends TCA Title 62, Chapter 32.

591.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 62, Chapter 18, Part 2 and Section 62-36-114, relative to the Soil Scientist Licensure Act of 2009.
591.description: As introduced, repeals the Soil Scientist Licensure Act of 2009. - Amends TCA Title 62, Chapter 18, Part 2 and Section 62-36-114.

592.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
592.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 62, relative to professions.
592.description: As introduced, lowers from 30 to 21 days, the time following a change of business address that a licensed polygraph examiner or licensed company has to notify the commissioner of commerce and insurance in writing. - Amends TCA Title 62.

593.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee for 3/29/2023
593.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7; Title 57 and Title 68, relative to alcohol.
593.description: As introduced, requires a beer wholesaler to keep each original bill of sale or a digital duplicate from the sale of beer to a beer retailer for three years rather than two years; requires the beer retailer to keep a duplicate of the bill of sale for three years rather than two years. - Amends TCA Title 7; Title 57 and Title 68.

594.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
594.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8 and Title 49, relative to recall of local school board members.
594.description: As introduced, allows registered voters of any county, instead of only Madison County, who reside within the geographic boundaries of an LEA to file a petition with the county election commission demanding the recall of a member of the LEA's local board of education. - Amends TCA Title 8 and Title 49.

595.last_action: Assigned to s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee
595.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8 and Title 50, relative to employment.
595.description: As introduced, enacts the "No Quit Act"; requires an employer that is requesting an employee to voluntarily resign to provide the employee with written notice of the rights, privileges, and benefits the employee waives or loses if the employee voluntarily resigns. - Amends TCA Title 8 and Title 50.

596.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
596.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 8, relative to the board of regents.
596.description: As introduced, requires the board, in consultation with the Tennessee higher education commission, to develop a standardized entrepreneurial program that must be offered at each institution governed by the board to provide an affordable, cost effective training program for students interested in starting a new business. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 8.

597.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 54, Chapter 1; Title 64 and Title 65, relative to transportation.
597.description: As introduced, establishes the office of rail and public transportation within the department; requires, among other duties and responsibilities, the office to determine present and future needs for, and economic feasibility of providing, public transportation and the retention, improvement, and addition of passenger and freight rail transportation in this state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 54, Chapter 1; Title 64 and Title 65.

598.last_action: Placed on cal. Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee for 3/29/2023
598.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 5; Title 58; Title 64, Chapter 3; Title 68 and Title 69, relative to weather-related information.
598.description: As introduced, requires the department to collect and publish data concerning landslides and floods; requires the department to establish a network of weather stations across the state. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 5; Title 58; Title 64, Chapter 3; Title 68 and Title 69.

599.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
599.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 2-6-202, relative to absentee ballots.
599.description: As introduced, changes the elements and classification of certain criminal offenses related to distribution of applications for absentee ballots. - Amends TCA Section 2-6-202.

600.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
600.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 64; Title 65 and Title 68, relative to utilities.
600.description: As introduced, requires a utility that provides electricity to prioritize the provision of electricity to a healthcare facility when engaging in load management for the electric service system. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 64; Title 65 and Title 68.

601.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
601.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 12; Title 43; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 50; Title 61; Title 66 and Title 67, relative to commerce.
601.description: As introduced, increases, from three to five days, the number of days a consumer reporting agency has to place a security freeze on a consumer report after receiving the written or electronic request from the Tennessee consumer. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 12; Title 43; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 50; Title 61; Title 66 and Title 67.

602.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
602.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 1, relative to campaign advertising.
602.description: As introduced, requires a county election commission to issue a notice requiring removal of campaign signs if the signs have not been removed from highway rights-of-way or other publicly owned property within three weeks after an election; authorizes the election commission to levy a civil penalty not to exceed $50 per day, per parcel of property on the candidate or campaign committee if the signs are not removed after receiving the notice. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 1.

603.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
603.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 50, relative to driver license services.
603.description: As introduced, authorizes the department of safety to prepare brochures that provide information on the opportunity for persons 18 to 20 years of age to apply for interstate CDLs and the opportunity for persons to apply to become third-party skills test examiners to perform skills tests required to obtain a CDL; requires the department to make the brochures available at driver license service locations throughout the state. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 50.

605.last_action: Placed on cal. Civil Justice Committee for 3/29/2023
605.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29; Title 36; Title 37; Title 47 and Title 71, relative to adoption.
605.description: As introduced, creates the tort of wrongful adoption; creates the Class A misdemeanor of engaging or attempting to engage in placing children for adoption in violation of state law. - Amends TCA Title 29; Title 36; Title 37; Title 47 and Title 71.

606.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56 and Title 71, relative to prior authorization.
606.description: As introduced, lowers from five business days to four business days, the time from the receipt of a request for more information from a utilization review agent within which the agent must notify the enrollee and the provider or healthcare facility in writing, or through email or respective electronic portals, of the additional information needed to make the determination on a request for prior authorization. - Amends TCA Title 56 and Title 71.

607.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, Chapter 6, Part 1, relative to insurance producer prelicensing courses of study.
607.description: As enacted, removes the requirement that an individual applying for an insurance producer license take a prelicensing course of study for a line of authority; removes other references to the prelicensing education requirement for applicants for an insurance producer license. - Amends TCA Title 56, Chapter 6, Part 1.

608.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8 and Title 56, relative to paid family leave.
608.description: As introduced, authorizes the issuance of an insurance policy that an employer may offer to an employee for the purpose of providing family leave benefits. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8 and Title 56.

609.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, Chapter 4, Part 2, relative to a premium tax credit for examination charges, fees, and expenses.
609.description: As introduced, authorizes a credit against premium taxes in the amount of the charges, expenses, and fees paid by insurance companies for certain examinations performed by the commissioner of commerce and insurance. - Amends TCA Title 56, Chapter 4, Part 2.

610.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 31 and Title 8, Chapter 6, relative to nepotism.
610.description: As enacted, clarifies that employees of state governmental entities who are compensated through funding sources other than this state are subject to the Tennessee State Employees Uniform Nepotism Policy Act of 1980; creates criminal and civil penalties for a state employee who violates the Act; authorizes the attorney general and reporter to investigate violations of the Act. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 31 and Title 8, Chapter 6.

611.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee for 3/29/2023
611.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 2, relative to the determination of intellectual disability of those sentenced to death.
611.description: As introduced, establishes the procedure for the administrative office of the courts to issue payment to an expert who makes a court-ordered determination of intellectual disability in a person who has been sentenced to death prior to May 11, 2021. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 2.

612.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 3, relative to wineries.
612.description: As introduced, authorizes two or more wineries to enter into an alternating proprietorship agreement to share certain premises of the wineries that are party to the agreement. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 3.

613.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
613.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to certificates of need.
613.description: As introduced, increases from 15 to 20 the number of days before the health facilities commission meeting at which an application for a certificate of need is originally scheduled that a healthcare institution wishing to oppose the application must file written notice with the commission. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71.

614.last_action: Assigned to s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee
614.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, relative to taxes and fees collected by merchants and sellers.
614.description: As introduced, requires that state and local taxes and fees be excluded from the calculation of interchange fees by payment card networks for electronic payment transactions. - Amends TCA Title 67.

615.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Calendar & Rules Committee
615.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 55 and Title 65, relative to vehicles that haul logs or pulpwood.
615.description: As introduced, requires motor vehicles or trailers transporting intrastate a load of logs or long pulpwood that protrudes beyond the length of the motor vehicle or trailer to have securely affixed to the vehicle a rear impact guard or impact absorbent guard extending across the rear of the vehicle or axle at a width equal to or greater than the interior width of the vehicle or axle. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 55 and Title 65.

616.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
616.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 51, Part 2; Title 9; Title 45; Title 47; Title 62; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to debt.
616.description: As introduced, authorizes any state agency, department, board, bureau, commission, or authority to which an individual owes a debt or that acts on behalf of an individual to collect a debt to submit to the Tennessee education lottery corporation a list of the names of all persons owing debts in excess of $75, instead of $100, for the purposes of collecting such debt from any lottery winnings. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 51, Part 2; Title 9; Title 45; Title 47; Title 62; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68.

617.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
617.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 53, Chapter 7, relative to the regulation of food derived from animal tissues.
617.description: As introduced, requires the department of agriculture to annually report to the energy, agriculture and natural resources committee of the senate and the agriculture and natural resources committee of the house of representatives the number of custom slaughterer licenses issued or renewed during the immediately preceding calendar year for each county in this state. - Amends TCA Title 53, Chapter 7.

618.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Calendar & Rules Committee
618.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, relative to the department of children's services.
618.description: As introduced, requires the department to notify the committing court within a certain period of time of the proposed discharge of a child committed to the custody of the department for an indefinite time; establishes a procedure to be followed when the committing court objects to the department's discharge of the child. - Amends TCA Title 37.

619.last_action: Assigned to s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee
619.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, Chapter 6, relative to child custody determinations.
619.description: As introduced, establishes a presumption, rebuttable by a preponderance of the evidence, that joint legal custody and equally shared parenting time is in the best interest of the child; removes the presumption under certain circumstances. - Amends TCA Title 36, Chapter 6.

620.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 8, relative to speed limits.
620.description: As introduced, increases the maximum speed limit on controlled-access state and interstate highways with four or more lanes to 75 miles per hour, from 70 miles per hour. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 8.

621.last_action: H. Placed on Consent Calendar for 3/27/2023
621.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 1, Part 3, relative to state symbols.
621.description: As introduced, designates "The Tennessee in Me" by Debbie Mathis Watts as an official state song. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 1, Part 3.

622.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
622.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56 and Title 66, relative to sinkholes.
622.description: As introduced, specifies that a seller of residential property is required to disclose the presence of a known sinkhole on the property prior to entering into a contract with a buyer regardless of whether the sinkhole is indicated through the contour lines on the property's recorded plat map. - Amends TCA Title 56 and Title 66.

623.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
623.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57 and Chapter 451 of the Public Acts of 2021, relative to the sale of alcoholic beverages.
623.description: As introduced, makes the authorization for licensed establishments to sell alcoholic beverages to go, which is set to expire July 1, 2023, permanent; requires each licensee who offers sales of alcoholic beverages to go to take additional training focused on compliance with the to-go alcohol law and avoiding sales to minors. - Amends TCA Title 57 and Chapter 451 of the Public Acts of 2021.

624.last_action: Assigned to s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee
624.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 50, relative to workers' compensation.
624.description: As introduced, defines "labor representative" for purposes of workers' compensation law; specifies that the person representing an employee in mediation for a workers' compensation claim may be a labor representative; requires the department of labor and workforce development to promulgate rules to allow a labor representative to participate with a party engaged in mediation or another form of alternative dispute resolution for a workers' compensation claim. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 50.

625.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, relative to prosthetic devices.
625.description: As introduced, requires health benefit plans to provide certain coverage for prosthetic devices. - Amends TCA Title 56.

626.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
626.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 12; Title 54; Title 55; Title 64; Title 65 and Title 67, relative to transportation.
626.description: As introduced, deletes an expired provision specifying which highway projects were to benefit from the 1986 gasoline tax increases. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 12; Title 54; Title 55; Title 64; Title 65 and Title 67.

627.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
627.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33; Title 50; Title 56; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to health care.
627.description: As introduced, removes the start date of January 1, 2012, for the requirement that a healthcare practitioner communicate the practitioner's full name and type of license in writing to a patient at the patient's initial office visit. - Amends TCA Title 33; Title 50; Title 56; Title 63 and Title 68.

628.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
628.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to K-12 education.
628.description: As introduced, requires an LEA to provide information on its website concerning the career-based experiences available to high school students. - Amends TCA Title 49.

629.last_action: Placed on cal. Civil Justice Committee for 3/29/2023
629.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, relative to department of children's services.
629.description: As introduced, requires the department to maintain staffing to allow case managers to have no more than 20 open cases, rather than an average of 20 active cases; states that a "person residing in the child's home" includes a person living in a residential setting with a child who is in the custody of the department for purposes of reporting, investigating, and treating child sexual abuse. - Amends TCA Title 37.

630.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
630.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 70, relative to hunting where bait is present.
630.description: As introduced, specifies that a person does not commit a Class C misdemeanor offense for hunting over bait so long as bait was not present while the person was hunting and the land is not posted by wildlife officers as a baited dove field. - Amends TCA Title 70.

631.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee for 3/29/2023
631.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 3, Part 3, relative to convenient voting centers.
631.description: As introduced, authorizes Henry County to establish a convenient voting center pilot program. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 3, Part 3.

632.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 56 and Title 71, relative to air ambulance memberships.
632.description: As introduced, prohibits an individual or entity from selling, offering for sale, or providing an air ambulance membership agreement to an individual who is enrolled in TennCare; requires an individual or entity that provides an air ambulance membership agreement to an individual who subsequently enrolls in TennCare to provide the enrollee with a pro-rated refund of consideration paid for the membership; adds other related prohibitions, requirements, and penalties. - Amends TCA Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 56 and Title 71.

633.last_action: Placed on cal. Health Committee for 3/29/2023
633.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9; Title 37 and Title 71, relative to funding child care services.
633.description: As introduced, creates the child care improvement fund, to be administered by the department of human services; requires the department to allocate grants from the fund to nonprofit organizations to be used for establishing new child care agencies or making improvements to existing agencies. - Amends TCA Title 9; Title 37 and Title 71.

635.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
635.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to candidates.
635.description: As introduced, allows a person who is excluded as a candidate from a primary ballot based on a determination that the person is not a bona fide member of the political party to qualify as an independent candidate if the nominating petition is filed within seven calendar days of the final determination of the exclusion. - Amends TCA Title 2.

636.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
636.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 14; Title 37; Title 50 and Title 68, relative to religious exemptions for immunizations.
636.description: As introduced, requires an employer that requires an immunization as a condition of employment or continued employment to exempt from the immunization requirement a person who files a signed, written statement that the immunization conflicts with the person’s religious tenets or practices; prohibits an employer from taking adverse action against a person who files a statement of religious objection. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 14; Title 37; Title 50 and Title 68.

637.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
637.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 4, Part 1, relative to the sale of alcoholic beverages.
637.description: As introduced, clarifies that restrictions on festival operators receiving certain services or items of value not authorized by the alcoholic beverage commission do not apply to an independent property owner, tenant, producer, or promoter of a festival. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 4, Part 1.

639.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
639.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, relative to the uniform commercial code.
639.description: As introduced, incorporates into the Uniform Commercial Code the amendments adopted by the Uniform Law Commission in 2022. - Amends TCA Title 47.

641.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33; Title 34; Title 36; Title 37; Title 41; Title 49; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to children.
641.description: As introduced, extends from March 1 to April 1 of each year, the date by which the department of children's services must appear before the judiciary committee of the senate and the civil justice committee of the house of representatives for a review of the policies of the department and attached protocol and procedures for these policies and any provisions that affect the children the department serves. - Amends TCA Title 33; Title 34; Title 36; Title 37; Title 41; Title 49; Title 68 and Title 71.

643.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
643.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 15, Chapter 2 and Title 49, relative to financial literacy.
643.description: As introduced, replaces Financial Literacy Week, the first full week of April, with Financial Literacy Month, the entire month of April; requires the financial literacy commission to study financial literacy education efforts and report to the general assembly by December 31, 2023. - Amends TCA Title 15, Chapter 2 and Title 49.

644.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
644.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7; Title 9; Title 49; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to higher education.
644.description: As introduced, removes provisions that required Middle Tennessee State University to implement a one-year pilot program pursuant to the Student Information in Higher Education Act of 2005. - Amends TCA Title 7; Title 9; Title 49; Title 63 and Title 68.

646.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Health Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
646.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, Chapter 18 and Section 63-2-102, relative to medical records.
646.description: As introduced, limits what can be included in calculating the permissible costs that may be charged for copying and mailing a patient's medical records. - Amends TCA Title 47, Chapter 18 and Section 63-2-102.

647.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Education Administration
647.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37 and Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to student attendance.
647.description: As introduced, increases the penalty, from a Class C misdemeanor to a Class B misdemeanor, for educational neglect of a child who is in poor academic standing; requires a petition filed with a juvenile court alleging educational neglect to state whether the child is in poor academic standing, - Amends TCA Title 37 and Title 49, Chapter 6.

648.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Education Administration
648.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1; Title 49, Chapter 2; Title 49, Chapter 5 and Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to local education agencies.
648.description: As introduced, requires an LEA to provide employees the opportunity to serve in a working group that annually collects, compiles, and submits a report of written suggestions received from the LEA's employees on how to improve the LEA to the LEA's director of schools and local board of education. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1; Title 49, Chapter 2; Title 49, Chapter 5 and Title 49, Chapter 6.

649.last_action: Placed on cal. Commerce Committee for 3/28/2023
649.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 39; Title 47; Title 48; Title 55; Title 56; Title 62; Title 66 and Title 67, relative to parking.
649.description: As introduced, prohibits a person from knowingly installing a vehicle immobilization device on a motor vehicle parked on private property in this state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 39; Title 47; Title 48; Title 55; Title 56; Title 62; Title 66 and Title 67.

650.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
650.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 55, Chapter 17, relative to subscription services for motor vehicle features.
650.description: As introduced, prohibits a motor vehicle dealer or manufacturer from selling, or offering for sale, a subscription service to access certain motor vehicle features; makes a violation an unfair or deceptive act or practice under the Tennessee Consumer Protection Act. - Amends TCA Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 55, Chapter 17.

651.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
651.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, relative to naturopathy.
651.description: As introduced, reduces from three years to two years, the period a seller must keep on file a signed acknowledgement from a buyer that discloses that the seller is neither a licensed practitioner of the healing arts nor meets the criteria that would allow the seller to provide a diagnosis, treatment, or medical care in order for the sale or provision of information involving a natural health information exchange to not be considered the illegal practice of naturopathy. - Amends TCA Title 63.

652.last_action: Failed in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
652.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to access to persons in health-related facilities.
652.description: As introduced, requires healthcare facilities and long-term care facilities to permit in-person visitation of a patient or resident by family members and community pastoral care members; allows the facilities to place limitations on the frequency and duration of visitation in certain areas and to require the visitors to comply with safety protocols. - Amends TCA Title 33; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

653.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
653.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, relative to taxes.
653.description: As introduced, permits the court in a tax collection proceeding to enter on the tax books a copy of the court order. - Amends TCA Title 67.

654.last_action: Placed on cal. Commerce Committee for 3/28/2023
654.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 62, Chapter 6, relative to contractors.
654.description: As introduced, increases the minimum total project cost amount for which a license as a contractor is required from $25,000 to $40,928; ties the minimum total project cost amount to the United States Bureau of Labor Statistics’ Producer Price Index by Industry: Building Materials and Supplies Dealers; requires the board for licensing contractors to update the amount at least annually and publish the amount on its public website. - Amends TCA Title 62, Chapter 6.

655.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10, Chapter 7 and Title 68, relative to vital records.
655.description: As introduced, requires the office of vital records to submit reports of fetal deaths to the chairs of the health committee of the house of representatives and the health and welfare committee of the senate within five business days of receipt. - Amends TCA Title 10, Chapter 7 and Title 68.

656.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
656.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 1; Title 4; Title 33; Title 37; Title 39; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to life.
656.description: As introduced, clarifies that references in Tennessee code annotated to "life," in the context of when life begins, means the moment that an egg is fertilized in the womb and there exists the presence of human chorionic gonadotropin (HCG). - Amends TCA Title 1; Title 4; Title 33; Title 37; Title 39; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

657.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 6, Part 3, relative to sales and use tax exemptions.
657.description: As introduced, exempts from sales tax the retail sale of infant diapers, wipes, and formula sold between July 1, 2023, and June 30, 2024. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 6, Part 3.

658.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Criminal Justice Subcommittee
658.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 5, relative to victims of sexual offenses.
658.description: As introduced, specifies that certain sexual offenses committed against minor victims of a certain age apply based on the age of the victim at the time of the offense. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 5.

659.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 17 and Title 62, Chapter 19, relative to auctions of previously titled motor vehicles that are antique or unique.
659.description: As enacted, authorizes the sale or purchase of previously titled antique or unique motor vehicles without a motor vehicle dealer license through auction formats that meet certain criteria. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 17 and Title 62, Chapter 19.

660.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 21, relative to certified statements of disability.
660.description: As introduced, authorizes licensed physical therapists to issue certified statements of disability in same manner as physicians for a person's application for a disabled registration plate, decal, or placard. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 21.

663.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
663.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-5-413, relative to persons prohibited from coming into contact with children.
663.description: As introduced, revises provisions governing criminal history checks of certain persons who come in direct contact with school children or children in a child care program, or who enter the grounds of a school or child care center while children are present. - Amends TCA Section 49-5-413.

664.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 53 and Title 63, relative to buprenorphine.
664.description: As introduced, prohibits a healthcare provider from prescribing a buprenorphine product unless the patient has first signed a copy of an informational document on the risks of buprenorphine use to pregnant women, unborn children, and infants; requires the department of health to make available on its public website the informational document within 90 days of the effective date of the act. - Amends TCA Title 53 and Title 63.

665.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 63, Chapter 11, relative to psychologist licensure.
665.description: As introduced, authorizes the board of examiners in psychology to designate as a health service provider in this state a person who has held a license to practice psychology in another state under certain conditions. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 63, Chapter 11.

666.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Calendar & Rules Committee
666.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to a prescription drug donation repository program.
666.description: As introduced, makes various changes to the prescription drug donation repository program operated by the department of health. - Amends TCA Title 56; Title 63 and Title 68.

667.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
667.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68 and Title 71, relative to nursing homes.
667.description: As introduced, removes provisions that required the department of health to provide reviewed recommendations, previously developed to protect nursing home residents from vendors and others who would seek to provide inappropriate or unneeded goods and services, to legislative committees by the second Tuesday in January 2010. - Amends TCA Title 68 and Title 71.

668.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
668.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 49 and Title 67, relative to school safety.
668.description: As introduced, requires the commissioner of education to submit the annual report on the implementation of, and compliance with, the Schools Against Violence in Education Act, in addition to the governor, to the chair of the senate education committee, the chair of the education administration committee of the house of representatives, and the legislative librarian, instead of the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 49 and Title 67.

669.last_action: Action Def. in s/c K-12 Subcommittee to Second Calendar of 2024
669.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to student promotion.
669.description: As introduced, requires a student to be seven years of age or older on or before August 15 or test proficient in the kindergarten academic standards based on a first-grade entry assessment before the student may be promoted to the first grade; requires the department of education to create, and local education agencies and public charter schools to administer, a first-grade entry assessment. - Amends TCA Title 49.

670.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 48, Chapter 101, relative to charitable solicitations.
670.description: As introduced, exempts a child care agency from the registration requirements for charitable organizations. - Amends TCA Title 48, Chapter 101.

671.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
671.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 5, relative to persons having an intellectual disability.
671.description: As introduced, requires department to determine whether any child who is placed in a youth development center has an intellectual disability. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 5.

672.last_action: Failed in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
672.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 21; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5 and Title 50, relative to insurance benefits.
672.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Family Insurance Act." - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 21; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5 and Title 50.

673.last_action: Failed in s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
673.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39; Title 66 and Title 68, relative to gated communities.
673.description: As introduced, requires TACIR to study and issue a report on the deterrent effect of gates blocking ingress and egress into communities as it relates to neighborhood crime. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39; Title 66 and Title 68.

674.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-4-104, relative to vehicle registrations.
674.description: As introduced, increases from 24 months to 36 months the period for which vehicle registrations by businesses that register at least 15,000 vehicles annually and that are engaged in the rental of motor vehicles, trucks, and trailers may be issued; specifies that the fees must be in an amount to offset the revenue that would otherwise be generated by 12-month registration fees. - Amends TCA Section 55-4-104.

675.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
675.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, relative to evaluations.
675.description: As introduced, deletes obsolete provision regarding the exclusion of student growth evaluation composites generated by assessments administered in the 2017-2018 school year for the 2018-2019 and 2019-2020 school years. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49.

678.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
678.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 45, relative to financial institutions.
678.description: As introduced, reduces, from 60 days to 45 days, the time within which, after the end of the calendar year, the commissioner of financial institutions must submit the department's annual report to the governor. - Amends TCA Title 45.

679.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-2-130, relative to released time courses.
679.description: As introduced, increases, from one-half unit to one unit, the amount of elective credit a student may receive for completing a released time course if the student's local board of education has adopted a policy to allow credit to be awarded to students for work completed in a released time course. - Amends TCA Section 49-2-130.

680.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
680.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8 and Title 68, relative to rescue squads.
680.description: As introduced, enacts the "Rescue Squad Recognition Act," which establishes a process by which the state fire marshal may issue a three-year certificate of recognition to a newly established rescue squad. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8 and Title 68.

681.last_action: Action Def. in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee to First Calendar of 2024
681.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 47 and Title 65, relative to social media.
681.description: As introduced, designates social media platforms as common carriers and requires the entities to obtain certificates of public convenience and necessity from the Tennessee public utilities commission; prescribes fines against social media platforms that deplatform and shadow ban users based on political ideology, viewpoint, or personal animus, or discrimination based on race, creed, color, religion, sex, age, or national origin. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 47 and Title 65.

682.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee of Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee
682.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 69, Chapter 9, relative to registration of vessels.
