1048.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 53, Chapter 15, relative to sorghum molasses.
1048.description: As introduced, removes a requirement that sorghum molasses that is sold or offered for sale in this state be prominently labeled as being either 100 percent pure sorghum molasses or not pure sorghum molasses; removes a cause of action for a person who suffers an injury or death, or an ascertainable loss of money or property, as a result of a violation of the labeling requirement. - Amends TCA Title 53, Chapter 15.

1049.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1049.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 45, Chapter 12; Title 45, Chapter 18; Title 45, Chapter 5 and Title 45, Chapter 7, relative to financial transactions.
1049.description: As introduced, increases, from $1.00 to $5.00, the threshold before which a borrower is entitled to a refund or refund credit of the precomputed interest charge for a loan that is precomputed that the borrower prepays in full. - Amends TCA Title 45, Chapter 12; Title 45, Chapter 18; Title 45, Chapter 5 and Title 45, Chapter 7.

1050.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/27/2023
1050.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33, Chapter 6, Part 4, relative to individuals authorized to complete certificates of need.
1050.description: As introduced, authorizes certain licensed advanced practice nurses and physician assistants to execute a certificate of need if a person is admitted and detained by a hospital or treatment resource for emergency diagnosis, evaluation, and treatment; makes other revisions to the execution of certificates of need. - Amends TCA Title 33, Chapter 6, Part 4.

1052.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1052.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 43; Title 44 and Title 69, relative to water pollution control.
1052.description: As introduced, removes an obsolete requirement that the commissioner of environment and conservation prepare and deliver a written report on stream bank erosion in this state to each member of the general assembly by January 15, 2000. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 43; Title 44 and Title 69.

1053.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee of Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee
1053.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 11, Chapter 14, Part 4; Title 66 and Title 69, relative to wetlands.
1053.description: As introduced, prohibits the department of environment and conservation from applying criteria that will result in the classification of real property as a wetland, or otherwise regulating real property as a wetland, unless the property is classified as a wetland under federal law. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 11, Chapter 14, Part 4; Title 66 and Title 69.

1054.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee of Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee
1054.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 221 and Title 69, relative to permits.
1054.description: As introduced, specifies that a discharge permit is not required under the Water Quality Control Act for excavations supporting agricultural activity or timber harvesting. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 221 and Title 69.

1055.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/27/2023
1055.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68 and Title 69, relative to permitting.
1055.description: As introduced, adds to the bill of rights for permit applicants under the Water Quality Control Act that permit applicants have the right to have their permit applications considered based on the contents of the permit application and conditions that exist at the time the permit application is under consideration, rather than possible future conditions unrelated to the purposes for which the permit is sought as identified in the application. - Amends TCA Title 68 and Title 69.

1056.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/27/2023
1056.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 69, Chapter 3, relative to permits.
1056.description: As introduced, requires the department of environment and conservation to exempt from compensatory mitigation an area equal in size to the area for which mitigation would not be required if the permit applicant qualified for coverage under a general permit, if the only factor that disqualifies an applicant for an aquatic resource alteration permit from having the activities for which a permit is sought covered under a general permit is the size of the area that the permit will apply to. - Amends TCA Title 69, Chapter 3.

1057.last_action: H. Placed on Consent Calendar for 3/27/2023
1057.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 8, relative to court officers.
1057.description: As introduced, authorizes trial judges in Memphis, within their annual budget appropriation, to appoint persons to serve as court officers who serve at the will and under the supervision of the appointing judge. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 8.

1059.last_action: Placed on cal. Commerce Committee for 3/28/2023
1059.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 50; Title 62; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to employment.
1059.description: As introduced, removes a provision that required the department of labor and workforce development to report by January 1, 2014, to the commerce and labor committee of the senate and the business and utilities committee of the house of representatives concerning the department's findings and recommendations concerning the Tennessee works pilot program. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 50; Title 62; Title 63 and Title 68.

1060.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 13; Title 42; Title 43; Title 44; Title 45; Title 46; Title 47; Title 48; Title 50; Title 53; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 61; Title 62; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to commerce.
1060.description: As introduced, removes references to repealed provisions of law that provided an additional definition of contractor, and additional penalties, in relation to unlawful representation as a licensed contractor. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 13; Title 42; Title 43; Title 44; Title 45; Title 46; Title 47; Title 48; Title 50; Title 53; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 61; Title 62; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71.

1061.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1061.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 39; Title 45; Title 47 and Title 48, relative to financial institutions.
1061.description: As introduced, removes a reference to a repealed provision of law that required state banks and certain securities broker-dealers to adhere to certain disclosure requirements of the federal deposit insurance corporation. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 39; Title 45; Title 47 and Title 48.

1062.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1062.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 13; Title 65 and Title 68, relative to utilities.
1062.description: As introduced, increases, from five to 10, the number of days the commissioner of finance and administration has to send notice to a municipality regarding the municipality's failure to remit funds in accordance with the amortization schedule for the municipality's waterworks construction loan agreement. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 13; Title 65 and Title 68.

1063.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1063.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 6 and Title 68, Chapter 221, relative to municipal services.
1063.description: As introduced, increases from three to four the number of copies of a plan of services that a municipality must provide for public inspection in connection with a proposed annexation. - Amends TCA Title 6 and Title 68, Chapter 221.

1064.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 50, Chapter 6 and Title 56, relative to workers' compensation.
1064.description: As introduced, extends from December 31 to January 1, the date by which the bureau of workers' compensation must produce its annual report listing the name of each covered employer that failed, during the preceding state fiscal year, to provide workers' compensation coverage or qualify as a self-insured employer as required by law. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 50, Chapter 6 and Title 56.

1065.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, relative to broadband.
1065.description: As introduced, requires that a broadband ready community’s ordinance or policy for reviewing applications must contain a provision that all applications related to the project be either approved or denied within 30 calendar days, rather than 30 business days, after the applications are submitted. - Amends TCA Title 4.

1066.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1066.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 34; Title 7, Chapter 52 and Title 65, relative to utility programs.
1066.description: As introduced, requires a municipal utility system or metropolitan electric plant that established a program before January 1, 2021, for purposes of accepting and distributing excess receipts for bona fide charitable purposes, and that operates the program on an opt-out basis, to begin operating the program on an opt-in basis by January 1, 2024. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 34; Title 7, Chapter 52 and Title 65.

1067.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1067.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 10; Title 13; Title 16; Title 29; Title 33; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 47; Title 49; Title 50; Title 55; Title 58; Title 65; Title 68 and Title 70, relative to firearms.
1067.description: As introduced, requires a handgun carry permit holder to notify the department of a change of address within 30 days, rather than 60 days. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 10; Title 13; Title 16; Title 29; Title 33; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 47; Title 49; Title 50; Title 55; Title 58; Title 65; Title 68 and Title 70.

1068.last_action: Assigned to s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee
1068.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to voters.
1068.description: As introduced, requires the last four digits of a voter's social security number to be included on the voter registration form and application for an absentee ballot, instead of the entire social security number. - Amends TCA Title 2.

1069.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 12 and Title 39, Chapter 13, relative to unmanned aircraft.
1069.description: As introduced, prohibits a state agency, local agency, or law enforcement agency from purchasing, acquiring, or otherwise using a drone or other covered telecommunications equipment or service produced by a manufacturer banned under the federal National Defense Authorization Act of 2019. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 12 and Title 39, Chapter 13.

1070.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 2 and Title 68, Chapter 11, relative to medical records.
1070.description: As introduced, authorizes a hospital or healthcare provider to charge, in response to a request for copies of records for an individual to appeal a denial of social security disability insurance or supplemental security income, a patient, patient representative, or other person authorized by the patient the reimbursement amount that disability determination services reimburses the hospital or provider for such records pursuant to federal social security administration medical record payment rates; prohibits a hospital or provider from charging a search fee if no records are located in response to the request. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 2 and Title 68, Chapter 11.

1071.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 25; Title 46, Chapter 6 and Title 58, relative to funeral honors.
1071.description: As introduced, requires the department to establish an honor guard grant program to provide grants to veteran service organizations to offset expenses incurred by the organization and members of the organization's honor guard in providing military funeral honors for qualifying Tennessee veterans. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 25; Title 46, Chapter 6 and Title 58.

1072.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1072.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 28; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to payment of court-ordered fines and fees.
1072.description: As introduced, requires a court clerk, when informing a person entering a payment plan of the consequences of failing to comply with the payment plan, to provide the information in writing. - Amends TCA Title 28; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 40.

1073.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, Chapter 7 and Title 63, Chapter 4, relative to payment rendered by chiropractors.
1073.description: As introduced, requires reimbursement payments from insurers to chiropractors for services rendered to be based on the same methodology for the calculation of payments to medical doctors for the provision of services. - Amends TCA Title 56, Chapter 7 and Title 63, Chapter 4.

1076.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 43; Title 53; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to food that is available for consumption at farmers markets.
1076.description: As introduced, creates a farmers market food unit permit for food service establishments that meet requirements for a temporary food service establishment to operate throughout a permit year at farmers markets. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 43; Title 53; Title 67 and Title 68.

1077.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee of Education Instruction
1077.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to family life curriculum.
1077.description: As introduced, requires the department of education to make available to LEAs on its website the guidelines developed by the state board of education, with the assistance of the department, for appropriate kindergarten through grade 12 instruction on adoption, what adoption is, and the benefits of adoption. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1078.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1078.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 6 and Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to courthouse square revitalization.
1078.description: As introduced, extends indefinitely the time frame, by deleting the June 30, 2028, termination date, that a municipality that continues to receive an allocation of state sales tax revenue pursuant to the now-repealed Courthouse Square Revitalization Pilot Project Act of 2005, will continue to receive the allocation of the revenue. - Amends TCA Title 6 and Title 67, Chapter 6.

1079.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 34, relative to tort liability.
1079.description: As introduced, clarifies that, in regard to a charitable organization's limitation of tort liability, providing shelter from adverse weather includes, but is not limited to, allowing persons to enter the premises for purposes of temporary shelter from severe storms. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 34.

1080.last_action: Placed on cal. Criminal Justice Committee for 3/28/2023
1080.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to crime.
1080.description: As introduced, reduces from 60 days to 30 days of the judgment, the time within which a court clerk must forward a copy of the judgment and date of birth of a person convicted of an animal abuse offense to the bureau for purposes of the bureau's publicly available list of persons with such convictions. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

1081.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to school choice.
1081.description: As introduced, makes various changes to the Tennessee Education Savings Account Pilot Program; expands student eligibility to allow all students eligible to enroll in a Tennessee public school in any of the grades kindergarten through 12 to participate, regardless of a local education agency's academic performance or the student's household income level; allows a participating student who is enrolled in a home school program to receive an education savings account. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

1082.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1082.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to criminal offenses.
1082.description: As introduced, changes from two days to two business days the time frame during which an adversary hearing on a petition to enjoin or restrain removal from the jurisdiction of material the district attorney general believes violates certain laws regarding material harmful to minors must be held and the timeframe after the conclusion of the hearing within which the court will reach a determination. - Amends TCA Title 39.

1083.last_action: Assigned to s/c Population Health Subcommittee
1083.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 39; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to abortion.
1083.description: As introduced, states that the term abortion, as defined for the offense of criminal abortion, does not include the use of contraceptives, including hormonal birth control, intrauterine devices, or emergency contraceptives. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 39; Title 63 and Title 68.

1087.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
1087.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to the Tennessee Investment in Student Achievement Act.
1087.description: As introduced, allows a local education agency (LEA) that experiences growth in its average daily membership (ADM), excluding the ADM of the LEA's virtual schools, exceeding 2 percent for each year of a two-consecutive-year period to be eligible for an infrastructure stipend for the 2023-2024 school year. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1088.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
1088.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 3, Part 8, relative to wine in grocery stores referendums.
1088.description: As introduced, clarifies which jurisdictions are eligible to hold a referendum to authorize the sale of wine in retail food stores. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 3, Part 8.

1089.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1089.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 9 and Title 49, relative to obscenity.
1089.description: As introduced, removes the educational justification of a person possessing obscene material if the person is at a school building, bus, school campus, grounds, recreational area, athletic field, or other property owned, used, or operated by a local education agency. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 9 and Title 49.

1090.last_action: Placed on cal. State Government Committee for 3/29/2023
1090.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 102, Part 6; Title 69 and Title 70, relative to no-wake zones.
1090.description: As introduced, makes it a Class C misdemeanor offense for a person to travel at a speed greater than a no-wake speed within 1,000 feet of a marina. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 102, Part 6; Title 69 and Title 70.

1091.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Transportation Subcommittee
1091.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-8-185, relative to operation of off-highway vehicles on certain roads and highways.
1091.description: As introduced, authorizes off-highway vehicles to be operated on roads and highways in Perry County. - Amends TCA Section 55-8-185.

1092.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1092.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to sales and use taxes.
1092.description: As introduced, requires any written reports and recommendations made by the department of revenue to the speakers and finance committees of the senate and house of representatives regarding sales taxes on electronic nicotine delivery devices to also be provided to the general assembly's legislative librarian. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 6.

1093.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, relative to anatomical gifts.
1093.description: As introduced, requires a procurement organization, or such organization's designee, that contacts an individual following the death of the decedent for purposes of allowing the individual to make an anatomical gift to explain to the individual that the individual can designate the decedent's whole body or a part; the process of making an anatomical gift and the condition the decedent's body will be in after the completion of the process; and that at the completion of the process, the decedent's body may be in a condition that necessitates cremation of the remains. - Amends TCA Title 68.

1094.last_action: Placed on cal. Health Committee for 3/29/2023
1094.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47; Title 50; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to temporary healthcare staffing.
1094.description: As introduced, prohibits temporary healthcare staffing agencies from charging healthcare facilities a price for temporary healthcare staffing that is grossly in excess of the price generally charged for the same or similar services in the usual course of business upon the declaration of an abnormal economic disruption by the governor by proclamation or executive order, and continuing for a maximum of 15 days, unless extended by a subsequent declaration in any county or municipality covered by the abnormal economic disruption. - Amends TCA Title 47; Title 50; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1095.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to home school.
1095.description: As introduced, prohibits a public school from using public funds to join, become members of, or maintain membership in an association that regulates interscholastic athletics unless the association's bylaws allow a home school student in good standing to immediately participate in an interscholastic athletic offered by a public school if the student was previously enrolled in the public school and participated as a member of the interscholastic athletic team while enrolled. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

1096.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/27/2023
1096.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to independent study.
1096.description: As introduced, requires each local education agency that operates a high school and each public charter high school to offer independent study programs to its enrolled high school students; establishes certain requirements for LEAs and public charter high schools offering independent study programs. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

1097.last_action: Assigned to s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee
1097.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, relative to juveniles.
1097.description: As introduced, removes the requirement that a delinquent or unruly child committed to the custody of the department for an indefinite time remain in custody for no longer than six months in absence of certain circumstances; requires a delinquent or unruly child committed to the custody of the department for an indefinite time to remain in the department's custody until discharge or other placement is warranted by the child's response to evidence-based services and programs or so long as necessary to receive evidence-based treatment or services provided by a qualified provider. - Amends TCA Title 37.

1098.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 3, relative to voting.
1098.description: As introduced, deletes provisions authorizing early voting; deletes provision authorizing a person other than the voter to fill out a request for an absentee ballot for the voter. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 3.

1099.last_action: Failed in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1099.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 38-8-107, relative to law enforcement officer training.
1099.description: As introduced, requires law enforcement officers to satisfactorily complete a diversity training program created by the peace officer standards and training commission by July 1, 2024, or within six months of the officer's date of employment. - Amends TCA Section 38-8-107.

1100.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/27/2023
1100.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 50 and Title 55, Chapter 51, relative to operation of motorcycles by minors.
1100.description: As introduced, authorizes a minor issued a motorcycle learner's permit to operate a motorcycle without limitations on the distance from the minor's home if the minor is accompanied by, and under the direct supervision of, a parent or legal guardian who is also operating a motorcycle and who holds a valid motorcycle operator's license. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 50 and Title 55, Chapter 51.

1102.last_action: Placed on cal. Government Operations Committee for 3/27/2023
1102.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 37, relative to juvenile justice.
1102.description: As introduced, creates the Tennessee juvenile justice review commission to review an appropriate sampling of juvenile justice cases and any critical incidents involving juveniles in order to provide the general assembly with findings and legislative recommendations. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 37.

1103.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1103.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to juveniles.
1103.description: As introduced, changes, from 18 years to 17 years, the age at which a juvenile committed to the department for an offense punishable by confinement in the penitentiary may be found to be incorrigible and, subject to an agreement between the commissioner of correction and the commissioner of children's services, may be transferred to the penitentiary. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41.

1104.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1104.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33; Title 37 and Title 49, relative to programs for at risk juveniles.
1104.description: As introduced, changes from January 15 to February 15 of each year the date by which the department must evaluate the success of programs for at risk adolescents and report findings and recommendations to the judiciary committee of the senate and the civil justice committee of the house of representatives. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33; Title 37 and Title 49.

1105.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1105.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 1 and Title 37, Chapter 5, relative to juvenile offenders.
1105.description: As introduced, allows a juvenile court to transfer a juvenile 16 years of age or older to a criminal court of competent jurisdiction to be tried as an adult for committing the offense of escape from a youth development center approved, certified, or licensed by the department of children's services. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 1 and Title 37, Chapter 5.

1106.last_action: Placed on cal. Government Operations Committee for 3/27/2023
1106.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 49, relative to Tennessee State University.
1106.description: As introduced, requires the chairs of the government operations committees of each house to review the report submitted to the general assembly by Tennessee State University of the university's progress in improving facilities and infrastructure and to determine if a further review of the university is needed based upon the university's progress of improvement in the report. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 49.

1107.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63 and Title 68, relative to the employment of physicians by hospitals and hospital affiliates.
1107.description: As introduced, removes the prohibition on employment of radiologists, anesthesiologists, pathologists, and emergency physicians by hospitals and hospital affiliates. - Amends TCA Title 63 and Title 68.

1108.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1108.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, Chapter 6 and Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 3, relative to custodial interference.
1108.description: As introduced, adds to the offense of custodial interference, a parent or other family member who harbors or hides a child within or outside this state, knowing that the child has been placed in the custody of the department of children's services pursuant to a protective custody order or an emergency custody order entered by a court; states that it is not a defense that the person harboring or hiding the child has not been served with an actual copy of a protective custody order or emergency custody order. - Amends TCA Title 36, Chapter 6 and Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 3.

1111.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1111.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, relative to public health.
1111.description: As introduced, requires the commissioner to submit a report by January 1, 2024, on the implementation of, and results from, the Child Nutrition and Wellness Act of 2006, to the chair of the senate health and welfare committee, the chair of the health committee of the house of representatives, and the legislative librarian. - Amends TCA Title 68.

1112.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
1112.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 69, Chapter 9 and Title 70, relative to the powers of the wildlife resources agency.
1112.description: As introduced, limits situations where wildlife officers may enter private property without the owner's consent, a warrant, exigent circumstances, or having observed a crime taking place. - Amends TCA Title 69, Chapter 9 and Title 70.

1113.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Higher Education Subcommittee of Education Administration
1113.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 4, relative to the Tennessee reconnect grant.
1113.description: As introduced, expands eligibility for the Tennessee reconnect grant to include students who completed high school or obtained a GED® or HiSET® diploma during the 2019-2020 or 2020-2021 school year, and who are at least 21 years of age by January 1 of the academic year in which they enroll in an eligible program of study. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 4.

1114.last_action: Assigned to s/c Higher Education Subcommittee
1114.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to the Tennessee higher education commission.
1114.description: As introduced, authorizes the commission to require the governing board of a public institution of higher education to terminate an existing on-campus or off-campus program, instead of only making recommendations regarding the termination of certain programs; requires the commission's executive director to notify the education committee of the senate and the education administration committee of the house of representatives of the commission's vote to terminate an existing program within 10 days of such action. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1115.last_action: Assigned to s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee
1115.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8 and Title 66, relative to the transfer of real property.
1115.description: As introduced, requires payment of a $2,500 fee for the transfer of real property located within communities governed by certain nonprofit property owners' associations; adds other related requirements. - Amends TCA Title 8 and Title 66.

1116.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 20 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 21, relative to exemptions from franchise and excise taxes.
1116.description: As introduced, exempts from franchise and excise taxes, a community development entity or sub-community development entity that is certified by the United States department of the treasury's community development financial institutions fund, and that has received an allocation of the federal new markets tax credits or federal sub-new markets tax credits from a community development entity that are used to fund a qualified low-income community investment in a Tennessee facility or operations of a business or nonprofit entity where the qualified low-income community investment expands the Tennessee-based operations of the business or nonprofit entity. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 20 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 21.

1117.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Local Government Committee
1117.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 88, relative to tourism development.
1117.description: As introduced, revises provisions governing "base tax revenues" under the Convention Center and Tourism Development Financing Act of 1998. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 88.

1118.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 3, relative to electronic storage of documents by wineries.
1118.description: As introduced, authorizes wineries and farm wine producers in this state to maintain copies of their licenses, permits, and other documents electronically for purposes of establishing compliance with the law; beginning July 1, 2024, authorizes wineries and farm wine producers that hold two or more licenses or permits to choose the expiration date for such licenses or permits within certain parameters. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 3.

1121.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 11; Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 5; Title 54; Title 68 and Title 69, relative to litter.
1121.description: As introduced, directs the Tennessee advisory committee on intergovernmental relations to perform a study of the overall severity and effect of litter on the maintenance and natural resources of state parks, and to report the committee's findings to each member of the general assembly and the legislative librarian. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 11; Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 5; Title 54; Title 68 and Title 69.

1122.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
1122.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 82, relative to utility districts.
1122.description: As introduced, prohibits a utility district from condemning property outside the service area of the utility. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 82.

1123.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1123.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 44 and Title 49, relative to open meetings.
1123.description: As introduced, requires a governing body to provide members of the public the opportunity to comment at a meeting of the governing body if the meeting is open to the public pursuant to the Open Meetings Law and if members of the public give proper notice to the governing body. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 44 and Title 49.

1124.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1124.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 48, Chapter 101, Part 5, relative to charitable solicitations.
1124.description: As introduced, increases from seven to 14 days the period within which an applicant for a charitable solicitation registration may request a hearing following receipt of notification that the applicant has not satisfied the registration requirements. - Amends TCA Title 48, Chapter 101, Part 5.

1125.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1125.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29; Title 39 and Title 44, relative to damage caused by animals.
1125.description: As introduced, requires judge to order payment of restitution by owner who is convicted of allowing their dog to run loose and the dog causes bodily injury or death to another person, or damages another person's property. - Amends TCA Title 29; Title 39 and Title 44.

1126.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
1126.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-8-185, relative to operation of off-highway vehicles on certain highways.
1126.description: As introduced, removes the limitation that ATVs and off-highway vehicles may be operated on a certain segment of State Route 330 within the Town of Oliver Springs in Anderson County only two weekends per year. - Amends TCA Section 55-8-185.

1127.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1127.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 10; Title 16; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to criminal justice.
1127.description: As introduced, extends from 90 days to 100 days, the amount of time in which captured plate data collected or retained by a governmental entity through the use of an automated license plate recognition system may be stored unless the data is retained or stored as part of an ongoing investigation. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 10; Title 16; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55.

1129.last_action: Placed on s/c cal K-12 Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1129.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to student enrollment.
1129.description: As introduced, requires an LEA to provide for the enrollment of students who are residents of this state, regardless of the student's residence, race, ethnicity, or language proficiency, the resources of the LEA or its schools, or other considerations regarding the appropriateness of a particular school for a particular student; allows a student's parent or legal guardian to appeal an LEA's enrollment or assignment decision for the student to the commissioner of education. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1130.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
1130.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 65, relative to electric cooperatives.
1130.description: As introduced, directs the Tennessee advisory commission on intergovernmental relations to perform a study of the coverage area for which electric cooperatives provide services within this state, and to report its findings to each member of the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 65.

1131.last_action: Assigned to s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee
1131.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 44; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to veterinary practice.
1131.description: As introduced, makes certain changes concerning establishment of a veterinarian-client-patient relationship; authorizes continuation of such relationship for up to 24 months, rather than 12 months, in case of livestock. - Amends TCA Title 44; Title 63 and Title 68.

1132.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to the reestablishment of the office of elected school superintendent.
1132.description: As introduced, allows counties and municipalities to reestablish the office of elected school superintendent. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1133.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Calendar & Rules Committee
1133.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 8; Title 9; Title 18; Title 54 and Title 67, relative to county officials.
1133.description: As introduced, clarifies the actions a county mayor must take in relation to the performance bond required before entering upon the discharge of the mayor's duties. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 8; Title 9; Title 18; Title 54 and Title 67.

1134.last_action: Placed on cal. State Government Committee for 3/29/2023
1134.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 34; Title 8, Chapter 35; Title 8, Chapter 36 and Title 8, Chapter 37, relative to retirement benefits.
1134.description: As introduced, clarifies that it is the responsibility of the member seeking to claim prior state service for retirement credit purposes to submit to the board of trustees of the Tennessee consolidated retirement system proper documentation as required by the board. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 34; Title 8, Chapter 35; Title 8, Chapter 36 and Title 8, Chapter 37.

1136.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1136.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 68-104-211, relative to fireworks.
1136.description: As introduced, requires the state fire marshal to accept an application for a public display of fireworks, regardless of when the application is submitted, and approve the permit for the display if all other permitting and safety requirements are met. - Amends TCA Section 68-104-211.

1137.last_action: Assigned to s/c Higher Education Subcommittee
1137.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 49; Title 50; Title 56; Title 62; Title 63 and Title 67, relative to higher education.
1137.description: As introduced, requires each higher education institution to distribute or make available, prior to the beginning of each school year instead of at the beginning of each school year, a written policy prohibiting hazing by any student or organization operating under the sanction of the institution. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 49; Title 50; Title 56; Title 62; Title 63 and Title 67.

1139.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1139.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 24; Title 37; Title 39 and Title 63, relative to human trafficking.
1139.description: As introduced, creates an evidentiary privilege for communications between human trafficking victims and employees or volunteers with an anti-human trafficking organization; requires nurses to obtain two hours in continuing education on human trafficking prior to license renewal. - Amends TCA Title 24; Title 37; Title 39 and Title 63.

1140.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1140.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, relative to criminal law.
1140.description: As introduced, prohibits members of the post-conviction defender oversight commission from advising, consulting, investigating, or otherwise directly assisting the post-conviction defender or the post-conviction defender's staff in providing legal representation in such cases. - Amends TCA Title 40.

1141.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1141.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to emergency services.
1141.description: As introduced, requires, by September 1, the department of health to submit a report to the chairs of the general assembly's health-related committees concerning the number of hospitals found, within the last 20 years, to have failed to provide emergency services in accordance with rules adopted by the board for licensing healthcare facilities, or failed to furnish such services to any applicant who applies for the services in case of injury or acute medical condition where the injury or condition is liable to cause death or severe injury or illness; requires the report to include the penalties assessed and collected pursuant to those violations. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71.

1142.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Health Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1142.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 9, Chapter 8; Title 13, Chapter 26; Title 29, Chapter 20; Title 33; Title 37, Chapter 1; Title 55; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to transportation services for persons with developmental disabilities, mental illness, or serious emotional disturbance.
1142.description: As introduced, lowers from one hour and 45 minutes to one hour and 30 minutes, the amount of time that the sheriff or transportation agent is required to remain at a hospital or treatment resource, which provides treatment for persons with mental illness or serious emotional disturbance, while a person transported to such facility by the sheriff or agent is evaluated for admission, after which the responsibility for the person turns over to the evaluating facility. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 9, Chapter 8; Title 13, Chapter 26; Title 29, Chapter 20; Title 33; Title 37, Chapter 1; Title 55; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1143.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee for 3/29/2023
1143.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 21 and Title 55, Chapter 4, relative to school buses.
1143.description: As introduced, clarifies that if a new person is designated to check school buses each time a bus returns from transporting children with disabilities to their respective destinations to ensure that all children have left the bus in the interim period between when annual reports are submitted to the LEA, then the name and contact information of the new designee must be submitted within 10 calendar days, instead of just within 10 days. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 21 and Title 55, Chapter 4.

1144.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
1144.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 57-4-102, relative to premier type tourist resorts.
1144.description: As introduced, designates the Tennessee Valley Railroad Museum in Chattanooga as a premier type tourist resort for purposes of consumption of alcoholic beverages on the premises. - Amends TCA Section 57-4-102.

1145.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Health Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1145.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63 and Title 68, relative to anesthesiology.
1145.description: As introduced, establishes the scope of practice for anesthesiologist assistants, subject to regulatory oversight by the board of medical examiners as part of such practice. - Amends TCA Title 63 and Title 68.

1146.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1146.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 64-1-810; Title 69 and Title 70, relative to the Tennessee wildlife resources agency.
1146.description: As introduced, increases from $0.0124 to $0.0123, the price per pound of mussels, shell with meat, that a person, firm, or corporation that purchases or otherwise obtains freshwater mussels taken from Tennessee waters must pay to the Tennessee wildlife resources agency. - Amends TCA Section 64-1-810; Title 69 and Title 70.

1147.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1147.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 11; Title 29; Title 43; Title 67; Title 68; Title 69 and Title 70, relative to outdoor recreation.
1147.description: As introduced, requires the department to electronically publish on the department's website all proposals for establishing trails and reports on trails that the commissioner submits to the governor and the general assembly pursuant to the Tennessee Trails System Act. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 11; Title 29; Title 43; Title 67; Title 68; Title 69 and Title 70.

1148.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1148.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to expunction of certain offenses.
1148.description: As introduced, requires a court to issue an order of expunction after a person completes the sentence imposed for any misdemeanor or Class D or E felony that was nonviolent and was not a sexual offense. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1150.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 8; Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 9 and Title 49, Chapter 5, Part 8, relative to sick leave banks.
1150.description: As introduced, authorizes the grant of sick leave from a sick leave bank to a state employee to care for a sick child of the employee. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 8; Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 9 and Title 49, Chapter 5, Part 8.

1151.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1151.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 49 and Title 62, relative to school safety.
1151.description: As introduced, changes, from 30 to 45, the number of days prior to a local education agency's adoption of a district-wide school safety plan or building-level school safety plan that a summary of the plan must be made available for public comment. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 49 and Title 62.

1152.title: AN ACT to designate the National Guard Armory to be constructed in Warren County as the "Major General Terry Max Haston National Guard Armory."
1152.description: As introduced, designates the National Guard Armory to be constructed in Warren County as the "Major General Terry Max Haston National Guard Armory".

1153.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1153.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 11; Title 64; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 69, relative to water resources.
1153.description: As introduced, changes, from five business days to 10 days, the time in which a final order related to water quality control by the board of water quality, oil and gas, or an administrative judge, must be published on the department of environment and conservation's website. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 11; Title 64; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 69.

1154.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1154.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 43 and Title 44, relative to agriculture.
1154.description: As introduced, lowers from five years to four years, the amount of time that must pass from the death of a nominee before such nominee can be inducted into the Tennessee agricultural hall of fame. - Amends TCA Title 43 and Title 44.

1156.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1156.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 11, Chapter 7; Title 43; Title 44; Title 53; Title 64, Chapter 10 and Title 67, relative to agriculture.
1156.description: As introduced, decreases, from 30 to 25 days, the time that a registrant of commercial fertilizer has after official notice from the commissioner of agriculture that the registrant's commercial fertilizer was found to be short in weight to pay the affected consumer a penalty equal to three times the value of the actual shortage. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 11, Chapter 7; Title 43; Title 44; Title 53; Title 64, Chapter 10 and Title 67.

1157.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to firearms.
1157.description: As introduced, lowers the age requirement to obtain an enhanced or concealed handgun carry permit or lawfully carry a handgun in public from 21 to 18 years of age; states that the statutory authorization to transport or store a firearm or firearm ammunition in a motor vehicle under certain circumstances does not apply to a person under 21 years of age in a parking area that is owned, operated, or while in use by any school, unless the person is at least 18 years of age and meets certain military qualifications. - Amends TCA Title 39.

1159.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Public Service Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1159.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12, Chapter 3, relative to public purchases.
1159.description: As introduced, removes insurance from the definition of "goods" as it relates to public purchasing. - Amends TCA Title 12, Chapter 3.

1160.last_action: Assigned to s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee
1160.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29 and Title 39, Chapter 17, relative to civil liability.
1160.description: As introduced, declares that a person or entity posting signage prohibiting the possession of firearms on the person's or entity's property is not immune from civil liability with respect to a claim based on the person's or entity's adoption of a policy prohibiting weapons. - Amends TCA Title 29 and Title 39, Chapter 17.

1161.last_action: Placed on cal. Civil Justice Committee for 3/29/2023
1161.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 5; Section 47-18-5519(f)(2); Section 56-7-1206(h)(1); Section 60-1-607(c)(2) and Section 66-34-104(f), relative to arbitration.
1161.description: As introduced, makes various revisions to the Uniform Arbitration Act. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 5; Section 47-18-5519(f)(2); Section 56-7-1206(h)(1); Section 60-1-607(c)(2) and Section 66-34-104(f).

1162.last_action: Engrossed; ready for transmission to Sen.
1162.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 48 and Title 56, relative to health care.
1162.description: As introduced, requires the commissioner of commerce and insurance to make the standardized forms for health care insurance claims, developed by the commissioner along with the commissioner of health, available to insurance companies for free on the department of commerce and insurance's website. - Amends TCA Title 48 and Title 56.

1163.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1163.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 20 and Title 4, Chapter 7, relative to the Tennessee highway patrol.
1163.description: As introduced, requires the commissioner of safety, in consultation with the commissioner of human resources, to ensure that a minimum of six Tennessee highway patrol officers are allocated to a county designated as a tier 3 or tier 4 enhancement county that has a size greater than 600 square miles and a population greater than 20,000 but less than 50,000. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 20 and Title 4, Chapter 7.

1164.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Education Administration
1164.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 49, relative to misconduct.
1164.description: As introduced, requires law enforcement officers, school resource officers, or other school security officers to report to a law enforcement agency a suspected offense rising from an investigation of harassment, intimidation, bullying, hazing, or cyber-bullying of a student or a visitor of a school who is under 18; creates a criminal offense for a person to knowingly interfere with a law enforcement officer, school resource officer, or other school security officer consulting with a district attorney general's office regarding the investigation. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 49.

1165.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1165.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 40, relative to restoration of voting rights.
1165.description: As introduced, prescribes duties for certain persons for purposes of assisting an individual with registering to vote following restoration of suffrage rights. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 40.

1166.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
1166.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-6-3017 and Title 55, Chapter 50, relative to student driving privileges.
1166.description: As introduced, removes the provisions of law regarding denial of a driver license or learner's permit to persons under 18 who are not enrolled in and making satisfactory progress in high school. - Amends TCA Section 49-6-3017 and Title 55, Chapter 50.

1167.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee of Education Instruction
1167.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to financial literacy.
1167.description: As introduced, requires the Tennessee financial literacy commission to host a financial literacy webinar for students in each of the grades six through eight that is age and grade appropriate and designed to educate students on budgeting, saving, spending, credit, debit, insurance, investment, and other topics and concepts associated with personal financial responsibility; requires public school students in any of the grades six through eight to participate in the financial literacy webinar. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1168.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1168.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 21; Title 37 and Title 40, relative to expunction.
1168.description: As introduced, requires the clerk of a court in which a petition for expunction may be filed to provide a petitioner with a simple form to enable a lay person to petition the court for expunction; deletes obsolete provision requiring the district attorneys general conference to create such a form. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 21; Title 37 and Title 40.

1169.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Public Service Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1169.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 41 and Title 68, relative to medical care.
1169.description: As introduced, requires the Tennessee peace officer standards and training (POST) commission to adopt guidelines and materials instructing law enforcement officers on the best practices for recognizing and responding to a medical crisis involving a person under arrest or under the care or supervision of the law enforcement officer. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 41 and Title 68.

1170.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1170.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to juveniles.
1170.description: As introduced, specifies that when sentencing a minor convicted as an adult, a court may impose a sentence less than the minimum under law; prohibits courts from sentencing juvenile offenders to life without the possibility of parole; authorizes minors convicted as adults who served at least 20 years to file a motion for a sentence reduction. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 39 and Title 40.

1171.last_action: Assigned to s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee
1171.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 45 and Title 47, relative to homeowners.
1171.description: As introduced, enacts the "Homeowner Bill of Rights." - Amends TCA Title 45 and Title 47.

1172.last_action: Failed in s/c Insurance Subcommittee of Insurance Committee
1172.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 35; Title 56 and Title 62, Chapter 5, relative to life insurance.
1172.description: As introduced, requires an insurer to provide the names of the beneficiaries of a decedent's life insurance policy, the benefit amount under the policy, and other information requested by a funeral director or funeral establishment that contacts the insurer on behalf of the decedent's family. - Amends TCA Title 35; Title 56 and Title 62, Chapter 5.

1173.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
1173.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 38 and Title 49, relative to school safety.
1173.description: As introduced, removes language that incorrectly refers to the department of safety as the department of safety and homeland security in a provision that requires the department of safety, in collaboration with the department of education, to develop a school security assessment for use in Tennessee public schools. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 38 and Title 49.

1175.last_action: Placed on cal. Finance, Ways, and Means Committee for 3/28/2023
1175.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5, Chapter 6 and Title 42, relative to airport authorities.
1175.description: As introduced, vacates and reconstitutes board of commissioners for an airport authority in a county having a metropolitan form of government; adds the governor and speakers of the general assembly as appointing authorities for board positions currently held by the executive officer of the local government. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5, Chapter 6 and Title 42.

1176.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1176.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, relative to domestic relations.
1176.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Domestic Relations Arbitration Act." - Amends TCA Title 36.

1177.last_action: Assigned to s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee
1177.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 7-4-202 and Section 67-4-1415, relative to taxes collected from hotels located within a municipality lying partly within a county with a metropolitan form of government and partly within an adjacent county.
1177.description: As introduced, clarifies that certain privilege taxes imposed by Davidson County on the privilege of occupancy in a hotel do not apply to hotels located within the City of Goodlettsville, which has previously imposed an occupancy tax. - Amends TCA Section 7-4-202 and Section 67-4-1415.

1178.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1178.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to electronic monitoring.
1178.description: As introduced, requires that the treasurer's report on the amount of any surplus in the electronic monitoring indigency fund be reported to the commissioner of finance and administration on or before January 15 of each year. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55.

1179.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1179.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 15 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 10, relative to tobacco, hemp, and vapor products.
1179.description: As introduced, creates a civil penalty of $500 for a second offense related to smokable hemp products; creates a civil penalty of $750 for a second offense related to vapor products. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 15 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 10.

1181.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/27/2023
1181.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 66, relative to service agreements.
1181.description: As introduced, enacts the "Prohibition on Unfair Service Agreements Act." - Amends TCA Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 66.

1182.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1182.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8 and Title 49, relative to education.
1182.description: As introduced, extends from October to November, the time within which a public institution of higher education that receives funds from the distribution of credit cards to students or any percentage from the use of cards bearing the college or university name or logo must report the amount of such funds or percentage received as well as how the funds were expended during the previous fiscal year to the education committee of the senate and the education administration committee of the house of representatives. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8 and Title 49.

1184.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/27/2023
1184.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 30 and Title 35, relative to trusts.
1184.description: As introduced, clarifies the power of a settlor of a revocable trust to change trustees; allows for modification of noncharitable irrevocable trusts by consent; makes various other relevant revisions. - Amends TCA Title 30 and Title 35.

1185.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1185.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 1, relative to magistrates.
1185.description: As introduced, rewrites the provisions for requests for review of a juvenile court case heard by a magistrate by changing the right from a de novo hearing by the juvenile court judge to a review by the juvenile court judge with a presumption of correctness as to the magistrate's order; makes other relevant revisions. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 1.

1188.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1188.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 6; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 47, relative to qualified civil liability actions.
1188.description: As introduced, limits the circumstances under which a qualified civil liability action may be brought against certain manufacturers, dealers, and sellers of firearms and related products. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 6; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 47.

1191.last_action: Failed in s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1191.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13, Chapter 23, Part 1 and Title 33, relative to social support.
1191.description: As introduced, authorizes the Tennessee housing development agency to establish secure campsites to assist those with short-term housing needs for up to two years; revises provisions relating to outpatient mental health treatment programs. - Amends TCA Title 13, Chapter 23, Part 1 and Title 33.

1192.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1192.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, relative to the desecration of venerated objects.
1192.description: As introduced, broadens the offense of desecration of a venerable object by changing the culpable mental state from intentionally to recklessly or knowingly desecrating a place of worship or burial or a state or national flag. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17.

1193.last_action: Placed on cal. Health Committee for 3/29/2023
1193.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 71, relative to Alzheimer's care.
1193.description: As introduced, changes from January 15 to February 15, the date by which each area agency on aging must submit a report to the general assembly regarding the status of the Alzheimer’s and dementia respite care pilot program in each year of the pilot program; adds the legislative librarian to the list of persons at the general assembly who must receive a copy of the report. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 71.

1194.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, relative to the practice of physical therapy.
1194.description: As introduced, allows the practice of physical therapy to be under the written or oral referral of a nurse practitioner or physician assistant; removes certain minimum education requirements to engage in the independent practice of physical therapy. - Amends TCA Title 63.

1195.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1195.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 50; Title 62 and Title 67, relative to apprenticeships.
1195.description: As introduced, requires the commissioner to ensure that a listing is made available to the public on the department of labor and workforce development's public website of apprenticeship programs that are mandated by state or federal law due to the program sponsor receiving funds or resources from the state or federal government and that are approved by the office of apprenticeship; requires the listing to be updated no less than twice annually. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 50; Title 62 and Title 67.

1196.last_action: Placed on cal. Local Government Committee for 3/28/2023
1196.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6 and Title 7, Chapter 67, relative to sports authorities.
1196.description: As introduced, reconstitutes boards of directors for sports authorities in certain counties having a metropolitan form of government. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6 and Title 7, Chapter 67.

1197.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1197.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 55, Chapter 10, relative to criminal offenses.
1197.description: As introduced, creates an offense of knowingly providing a motor vehicle to another person who the provider of the vehicle knows or should know is under the influence of an intoxicant or whose driver license has been suspended or revoked under certain circumstances, punishable as a Class A misdemeanor. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 55, Chapter 10.

1199.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1199.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56 and Title 67, relative to tax relief.
1199.description: As introduced, changes the date, from March 19 to March 18, 1991, of authorization for an insurance company affiliate to be considered eligible for a tax credit based on the affiliate's reinsurance agreement with an insurance company, in which the tax imposed on gross premiums is allocated from the ceding company to the reinsuring company and allows the reinsuring company to use the premium tax liability as a tax credit. - Amends TCA Title 56 and Title 67.

1200.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1200.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 17 and Title 49, relative to nonprofit organizations.
1200.description: As introduced, exempts a school foundation or a school support organization that is a nonprofit organization and is seeking to operate an annual nonprofit gaming event for the benefit of the organization from submitting an annual event application each year; instead, the application is renewed each year; requires the one-time application to be updated for any changes of information; waives subsequent application fees for such nonprofit organization. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 17 and Title 49.

1201.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Education Administration
1201.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13 and Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 8, relative to schools.
1201.description: As introduced, authorizes a faculty or staff member of a school to carry a concealed handgun on school grounds subject to certain conditions, including obtaining an enhanced handgun carry permit and completing annual training. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13 and Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 8.

1202.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1202.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 39, Chapter 17; Title 49, Chapter 6 and Title 62, Chapter 35, relative to school safety.
1202.description: As introduced, increases the time period by which a local education agency must make a district-wide and building-level school safety plan available for public comment, from 30 to 45 days, prior to the adoption of the proposed plan. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 39, Chapter 17; Title 49, Chapter 6 and Title 62, Chapter 35.

1203.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1203.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 49, relative to firearms.
1203.description: As introduced, extends the time in which a handgun carry permit holder is required to inform the department of safety of any change in the permit holder's principal place of residence from 60 days to 90 days. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 49.

1204.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 34, Chapter 6, Part 2 and Title 68, relative to persons authorized to make health care decisions for patients.
1204.description: As introduced, requires a full medical record to be provided within 24 hours of a written request submitted by a person with power of attorney for health care to make health care decisions for a patient; grants 24-hour patient visitation rights to a person with a durable power of attorney for health care, with certain exceptions. - Amends TCA Title 34, Chapter 6, Part 2 and Title 68.

1205.last_action: Failed in s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1205.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6 and Title 67, relative to local government.
1205.description: As introduced, increases from four to six, the minimum number of regular meetings of the county legislative body each year; provides that, until otherwise set by ordinance by the board of commissioners in a city under a city manager-commission charter, regular meetings of the board must be held on the first and third Tuesdays, instead of Thursdays, of each month. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6 and Title 67.

1206.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1206.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 120, relative to construction.
1206.description: As introduced, increases from 120 to 180 days the period within which a public building must come into full compliance if the public building was constructed, enlarged, or substantially altered or repaired after July 1, 2012, and is discovered to have deviated from the standards and specifications of the Tennessee Public Buildings Accessibility Act. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 120.

1207.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1207.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 38; Title 50 and Title 56, relative to liability insurance for law enforcement officers.
1207.description: As introduced, prohibits a law enforcement agency from employing a peace officer unless the peace officer obtains and continuously maintains liability insurance to cover damages resulting from misconduct, including intentional, negligent, or willful acts committed by the peace officer while acting in the scope of the peace officer's employment for the law enforcement agency. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 38; Title 50 and Title 56.

1208.last_action: Placed on cal. Local Government Committee for 3/28/2023
1208.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 9; Title 28; Title 66 and Title 67, relative to real property.
1208.description: As introduced, extends the time eligible taxpayers may apply for a refund or present a credit voucher for credit on their taxes from within 35 days from the date taxes in the jurisdiction become delinquent for that year to within 40 days from that date. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 9; Title 28; Title 66 and Title 67.

1209.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1209.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8 and Title 38, relative to law enforcement.
1209.description: As introduced, authorizes certain nonprofit property owners associations to employ and commission police officers. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8 and Title 38.

1210.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
1210.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 3; Title 7; Title 65 and Title 67, relative to broadband services.
1210.description: As introduced, adds certain requirements for receiving grants under the Broadband Accessibility Grant Program. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 3; Title 7; Title 65 and Title 67.

1211.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 50 and Title 57, relative to employment of minors.
1211.description: As introduced, removes the prohibition that a person 16 or 17 years of age may not be employed in any place where the average monthly gross receipts from the sale of intoxicating beverages exceeds 25 percent of the total gross receipts of the place of employment if the person is not permitted to take orders for or serve intoxicating beverages. - Amends TCA Title 50 and Title 57.

1215.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1215.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 20 and Title 67, Chapter 5, relative to property purchased by a county at a tax sale.
1215.description: As introduced, provides that whenever Cumberland County acquires property at a tax sale, a non-governmental entity holding a vested and duly recorded contractual right to the payment of fees or assessments secured by such property retains such right; provides that Cumberland County is liable for the payment of such fees and assessments if the county makes actual use of the property purchased at the tax sale. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 20 and Title 67, Chapter 5.

1216.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1216.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9 and Title 49, relative to capital projects.
1216.description: As introduced, sets a deadline of February 15 by which TACIR must present its annual inventory of statewide public infrastructure needs and costs for provision of adequate and essential public infrastructure to the general assembly each year. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9 and Title 49.

1217.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1217.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 54; Title 55; Title 65; Title 66 and Title 67, relative to railroads.
1217.description: As introduced, requires railroad companies to send to the department of transportation, on an annual basis, a report containing statements of the operations of the company, unless the railroad companies prepare such statements of operations on a monthly or quarterly basis. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 54; Title 55; Title 65; Title 66 and Title 67.

1218.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1218.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 3, relative to members of the general assembly.
1218.description: As introduced, requires orientation of new members to take place within 90 days after election or appointment. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 3.

1219.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
1219.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 9, Chapter 4 and Title 12, relative to state buildings and facilities.
1219.description: As introduced, requires policy for lease payments for space occupied by state agencies to be established by the commissioner of finance and administration, instead of the commissioner of general services, and approved by the state building commission. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 9, Chapter 4 and Title 12.

1220.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1220.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3 and Title 4, relative to reports to the general assembly.
