1220.description: As introduced, requires each report that is required to be submitted to the general assembly that relates to procurement, unemployment, labor, or contracting with this state to contain a component that describes any relevant demographic information. - Amends TCA Title 3 and Title 4.

1221.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1221.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12; Title 13; Title 16; Title 49, Chapter 3; Title 54; Title 55; Title 64; Title 67 and Title 71, relative to public finances.
1221.description: As introduced, requires each board to notify the commissioner of finance and administration when the estimate of board fees for a fiscal year is more than the certified amount of board fees required by the board for that fiscal year. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12; Title 13; Title 16; Title 49, Chapter 3; Title 54; Title 55; Title 64; Title 67 and Title 71.

1223.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 20; Title 29 and Title 47, relative to consumer protection.
1223.description: As introduced, increases the time frame, from 90 to 95 days, when it is considered to be an unfair or deceptive act for a business to advertise that the business is going out of business. - Amends TCA Title 20; Title 29 and Title 47.

1224.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
1224.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 8-23-103 and Title 36, relative to child support.
1224.description: As introduced, extends the time within which a party may request a rehearing of the determination of a child support magistrate from five days to 10 days. - Amends TCA Section 8-23-103 and Title 36.

1226.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33; Title 53; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to the treatment of opioid abuse disorder.
1226.description: As introduced, requires the department of mental health and substance abuse services to make available on its public website an electronic copy of the written minutes of each meeting of the Tennessee opioid abatement council. - Amends TCA Title 33; Title 53; Title 63 and Title 68.

1227.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 64, Chapter 2, Part 2, relative to the South Central Tennessee Railroad Authority.
1227.description: As introduced, allows the annual report of financial expenditures, activities, and proposed plans, which is submitted by the board of directors of the South Central Tennessee Railroad Authority to the department of transportation and to the governing bodies of Dickson, Hickman, Lewis, Perry, and Wayne counties, and the cities of Centerville, Dickson, Hohenwald, Linden, and Waynesboro, to be submitted electronically. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 64, Chapter 2, Part 2.

1228.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1228.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13, Chapter 23; Title 48, Chapter 101, Part 9; Title 67, Chapter 5 and Section 67-4-409, relative to real property.
1228.description: As introduced, requires a county having a metropolitan form of government that creates a special escrow account earmarked for the sole purpose of generating revenue to provide low income persons with safe and affordable housing to notify the Tennessee housing development agency and the chairs of the local government committee of the house of representatives and the state and local government committee of the senate. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13, Chapter 23; Title 48, Chapter 101, Part 9; Title 67, Chapter 5 and Section 67-4-409.

1229.last_action: Placed on cal. State Government Committee for 3/29/2023
1229.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 4-1-401, relative to daylight saving time.
1229.description: As introduced, exempts the state from daylight saving time upon the states of Alabama, Arkansas, Georgia, Kentucky, Mississippi, and North Carolina exempting themselves from daylight saving time. - Amends TCA Section 4-1-401.

1230.last_action: Placed on cal. Commerce Committee for 3/28/2023
1230.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29; Title 39; Title 47; Title 48 and Title 67, relative to ticket sales.
1230.description: As introduced, requires a third-party ticket reseller to disclose specific information related to the cost of a ticket; prohibits such a reseller from preserving more than 45 percent of the tickets that the reseller has as a holdback; specifies that a violation of the disclosure requirements and holdback prohibition is a violation of the Tennessee Consumer Protection Act of 1977. - Amends TCA Title 29; Title 39; Title 47; Title 48 and Title 67.

1233.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1233.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38 and Title 55, relative to the operation of law enforcement vehicles.
1233.description: As introduced, requires a law enforcement officer to use only an appropriately marked law enforcement vehicle to make traffic stops in non-emergency situations; defines an appropriately marked law enforcement vehicle as one that bears insignias, stripes, decals, labels, seals, symbols, or other pictorial signs or lettering indicating the vehicle's identity as a law enforcement vehicle used by a particular law enforcement agency. - Amends TCA Title 38 and Title 55.

1234.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1234.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 10 and Title 38, relative to law enforcement.
1234.description: As introduced, prohibits a law enforcement agency from engaging in law enforcement activities which interfere with any person's First Amendment rights, engaging in First Amendment-related intelligence, or maintaining personal information about any person for the purpose of First Amendment-related intelligence unless the information is collected in the course of a lawful investigation of criminal conduct and is relevant to such investigation. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 10 and Title 38.

1235.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1235.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38, Chapter 8, relative to law enforcement agencies.
1235.description: As introduced, enacts the "Demilitarization of Police Act." - Amends TCA Title 38, Chapter 8.

1236.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Civil Justice Subcommittee
1236.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29 and Title 38, Chapter 8, relative to claims against law enforcement officers.
1236.description: As introduced, creates a civil right of action by an injured party against a law enforcement officer who subjects the injured party to the deprivation of an individual right secured by the Tennessee Constitution; declares that qualified immunity, governmental immunity, and statutory limitations on damages do not apply to this civil right of action; makes other provisions regarding the payment of damages. - Amends TCA Title 29 and Title 38, Chapter 8.

1237.last_action: Assigned to s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee
1237.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 6, relative to the attorney general and reporter.
1237.description: As introduced, requires the attorney general and reporter to post online a listing of all current litigation that could impact the interpretation of this state's constitution in which this state is a party; requires the attorney general and reporter to post an annual report online of such litigation resulting in a final disposition. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 6.

1238.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Corrections Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1238.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 9; Title 12 and Title 41, relative to private prison contractors.
1238.description: As introduced, prohibits the commissioner of the department of correction and a local governmental entity from entering into, renewing, or extending a contract for correctional services with a private prison contractor; deletes the Private Prison Contracting Act of 1986 upon the expiration of all such contracts. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 9; Title 12 and Title 41.

1239.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1239.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13, relative to zoning.
1239.description: As introduced, before enacting a zoning ordinance or any amendment thereto, the chief legislative body of a municipality shall publish notice of the public hearing to consider the ordinance or amendment on its website, if available, at least 15 days in advance of the hearing. - Amends TCA Title 13.

1241.last_action: Placed on cal. Criminal Justice Committee for 3/28/2023
1241.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to drug offenses.
1241.description: As introduced, enacts the "One Pill Will Kill Act." - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1242.last_action: Assigned to s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee
1242.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 50-6-226, relative to workers' compensation.
1242.description: As introduced, extends the permitted occurrence date, from June 30, 2023, to June 30, 2025, for an injury underlying a workers' compensation case in which the court of workers' compensation claims is authorized to award reasonable attorneys' fees and costs if an employer wrongfully denies a claim or fails to timely initiate a benefit to which the employee or a dependent is entitled for the injury. - Amends TCA Section 50-6-226.

1243.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to the office of elected superintendent of schools.
1243.description: As introduced, enacts the "Local School District Empowerment Act"; allows for the establishment of the office of elected superintendent of schools; adjusts duties of local boards of education in school systems in which the office of elected superintendent of schools is established. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1244.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 23, relative to the death penalty.
1244.description: As introduced, allows for a sentence of death to be carried out by electrocution as an alternative to lethal injection if the commissioner of correction certifies to the governor that the department is unable to adhere to the lethal injection protocol required to carry out the sentence of death. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 23.

1245.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
1245.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 37; Title 39; Title 49; Title 50; Title 55; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to immigration.
1245.description: As introduced, removes exemptions from prosecution of the offense of transporting illegal aliens for common carriers and those transporting individuals for religious purposes. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 37; Title 39; Title 49; Title 50; Title 55; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71.

1246.last_action: Placed on cal. State Government Committee for 3/29/2023
1246.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12; Title 39; Title 50; Title 66; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to immigration.
1246.description: As introduced, prohibits an illegal alien from being housed on real property owned by this state or a political subdivision of this state; excepts incarceration and other housing required as a result of a criminal conviction. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12; Title 39; Title 50; Title 66; Title 68 and Title 71.

1247.last_action: Placed on cal. Criminal Justice Committee for 3/28/2023
1247.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 38; Title 39; Title 45; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to abuse of elders and vulnerable adults.
1247.description: As introduced, requires the department of human services to advertise prominently on the home page of the department's website the division of adult protective services' toll-free telephone service that enables citizens within the state to call the division free of charge to report abuse, neglect, or exploitation and to seek relevant assistance from the division in such matters. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 38; Title 39; Title 45; Title 68 and Title 71.

1248.last_action: Action def. in Education Administration to 4/5/2023
1248.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 51; Title 5; Title 6; Title 9; Title 49 and Title 67, relative to education.
1248.description: As introduced, deletes an obsolete reference to the date July 1, 1993, after which a child is not able to enter first grade without having attended an approved kindergarten program, unless the child otherwise meets the requirements of the state board of education for transfer or admission and is accepted by the LEA. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 51; Title 5; Title 6; Title 9; Title 49 and Title 67.

1250.last_action: Placed on cal. Criminal Justice Committee for 3/28/2023
1250.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to sexual offenses committed against children.
1250.description: As introduced, expands the definition of "sexual activity," as used in the offense of soliciting sexual exploitation of a minor, to include exhibition of the female breast, genitals, buttocks, anus, or pubic or rectal area of any person that can be reasonably construed as being for the purpose of the sexual arousal or gratification of the defendant or another. - Amends TCA Title 39.

1251.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1251.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, relative to victims of crime.
1251.description: As introduced, provides a procedure for the enforcement of a victim's constitutional and statutory rights in a court exercising jurisdiction over the criminal offense committed against the victim by the district attorney general prosecuting the criminal offense or the victim. - Amends TCA Title 40.

1252.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 40-25-129, relative to witnesses.
1252.description: As introduced, requires the county to seek to recover from a convicted defendant who is declared not to be indigent, the costs of the advance or reimbursement of witness expenses made by the department of correction, which were necessary to the prosecution of a criminal case. - Amends TCA Section 40-25-129.

1254.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68 and Title 69, relative to the environment.
1254.description: As introduced, changes from March 31 to February 1, the date by which each region must submit its annual report to the commissioner of environment and conservation for the immediately preceding calendar year that includes data on collection, recycling, transportation, disposal, public costs, and other information deemed relevant to solid waste planning and management. - Amends TCA Title 68 and Title 69.

1255.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1255.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 40, relative to voting rights.
1255.description: As introduced, removes the permanent deprivation of the right of suffrage upon conviction of certain infamous crimes; changes the revocation of a person's voting rights pursuant to a conviction for an infamous crime to a temporary suspension of voting rights for the period of confinement, probation, or parole; automatically restores a person's voting rights upon release from confinement, probation, or parole. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 40.

1256.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1256.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9; Title 14; Title 29; Title 38; Title 49; Title 50; Title 63; Title 68 and Chapter 896 of the Public Acts of 2022, relative to public health.
1256.description: As introduced, makes various provisions regarding COVID-19 permanent. - Amends TCA Title 9; Title 14; Title 29; Title 38; Title 49; Title 50; Title 63; Title 68 and Chapter 896 of the Public Acts of 2022.

1257.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1257.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 30, relative to probate.
1257.description: As introduced, requires a personal representative for an estate to serve a copy of each claim filed against the estate, within five days of receipt, to any known party interested in the estate, including creditors, distributees, and heirs. - Amends TCA Title 30.

1258.last_action: Placed on cal. Civil Justice Committee for 3/29/2023
1258.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29 and Title 66, relative to real property.
1258.description: As introduced, removes ambiguous language and clarifies that a transfer of a possibility of reverter or right of entry by a holder other than the original grantor is invalid unless the validity of the future interest was determined by a final judgment in a judicial proceeding, or by a settlement among interested persons, prior to July 1, 2015. - Amends TCA Title 29 and Title 66.

1259.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1259.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 39-14-206 and Title 70, relative to the taking of aquatic creatures.
1259.description: As introduced, establishes requirements and limitations for the use of a trotline to kill, catch, or take fish or other aquatic life. - Amends TCA Section 39-14-206 and Title 70.

1260.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
1260.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to individualized education account program.
1260.description: As introduced, requires the department, in administering the individualized education account program, to develop and implement a process for notifying all parents of their children's potential eligibility for an individualized education account, instead of only ensuring lower-income families are so notified; requires the department to report whether the process increased student participation in the program to the education committee of the senate and the education administration committee of the house of representatives by January 31 of each year. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1261.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 49, relative to the board of regents.
1261.description: As introduced, changes, from five days to seven days, the amount of notice the secretary must give board members of called meetings. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 49.

1262.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1262.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 50, relative to employer and employee relations.
1262.description: As introduced, requires the department of labor and workforce development to conduct a study of the Child Labor Act of 1976 and the Tennessee Protection of Minor Performers Act, and to report its findings to the governor, the speaker of the house of representatives, the speaker of the senate, and the legislative librarian no later than December 1, 2023. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 50.

1263.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1263.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 10; Title 38 and Title 39, relative to constables.
1263.description: As introduced, requires as a qualification for office that a constable be certified by a qualified healthcare provider as being free from any mental impairment that would affect the constable's ability to perform an essential function of the job with or without reasonable accommodation; requires a constable with law enforcement powers to successfully complete a training program that is equivalent to or superior to the training or continuing training required for a law enforcement officer under standards established by the peace officer standards and training commission. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 10; Title 38 and Title 39.

1264.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1264.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, relative to the county board of equalization.
1264.description: As introduced, changes who has discretion to determine whether a hearing on a complaint before a county board of equalization will be held virtually from the board to the taxpayer or owner. - Amends TCA Title 67.

1265.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1265.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 6, relative to disclosure of stored wire or electronic communications.
1265.description: As introduced, requires law enforcement, district attorneys, and the attorney general to obtain a warrant for disclosure of stored wire or electronic communications and related transactional records; removes a subpoena or other lawful process except a warrant as a process for obtaining disclosure of stored wire or electronic communications and transactional records. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 6.

1266.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
1266.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 67-6-303, relative to tax exemption for service members of the armed forces.
1266.description: As introduced, adds an adopted child, stepchild, and relative related by marriage to the list of persons with whom a service member can jointly title and register a motor vehicle in order to qualify for a sales and use tax exemption on the sale or use of the motor vehicle. - Amends TCA Section 67-6-303.

1267.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1267.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 29, Chapter 17 and Title 29, Chapter 16, relative to eminent domain.
1267.description: As introduced, changes, from 30 days to 60 days, the time in which a respondent who is not satisfied with the amount deposited by a condemner, or otherwise objects to a taking through the use of eminent domain, must file an answer to the petition initiating a condemnation proceeding. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 29, Chapter 17 and Title 29, Chapter 16.

1268.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to student pronouns.
1268.description: As introduced, specifies that a teacher or other employee of a public school or LEA is not required to refer to a student using the student's preferred pronoun if the pronoun is not consistent with the student's biological sex; insulates a teacher or other employee of a public school or LEA from civil liability and adverse employment action for referring to a student using the pronoun that is consistent with the student's biological sex. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

1269.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 36, relative to community corrections.
1269.description: As introduced, adds medical treatment to the list of noncustodial community corrections options for which community corrections funds may be used to develop or expand the range of community punishments and services available at the local level. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 36.

1271.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 19, Part 1 and Title 68, Chapter 11, relative to physician assistants.
1271.description: As introduced, expands the scope of practice for physician assistants, subject to increased regulatory oversight by the board of physician assistants as part of such expanded practice. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 19, Part 1 and Title 68, Chapter 11.

1274.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Calendar & Rules Committee
1274.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29; Title 57 and Title 62, Chapter 35, relative to training requirements for security guards and officers.
1274.description: As introduced, exempts security guards and officers who are retired law enforcement officers with 20 or more years of service and who retired in good standing from certain training requirements. - Amends TCA Title 29; Title 57 and Title 62, Chapter 35.

1275.last_action: Placed on cal. Commerce Committee for 3/28/2023
1275.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 16, Chapter 15 and Title 66, relative to retainages.
1275.description: As introduced, specifies circumstances under which a contractor can seek early release of a retainage held by a party with which the contractor has a written contract; makes other changes related to retainages for contractors. - Amends TCA Title 16, Chapter 15 and Title 66.

1276.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
1276.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13, Chapter 7, Part 4, relative to historic zoning commission members.
1276.description: As enacted, removes authorization for the chief executive of a city or county, with the approval of the local legislative body, to fill a vacancy or remove an appointed member on a historic zoning commission. - Amends TCA Title 13, Chapter 7, Part 4.

1277.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee for 3/29/2023
1277.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, relative to vision standards for a license to drive.
1277.description: As introduced, lowers the minimum visual acuity requirement for drivers of non-commercial vehicles from 20/40 to 20/50. - Amends TCA Title 55.

1278.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
1278.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7 and Title 67, relative to public funding for convention center facilities.
1278.description: As introduced, terminates future increases to the metropolitan government tourist accommodation tax and previously authorized privilege taxes that were increases from the base tax, for which proceeds are used to fund the convention center in Davidson County; terminates other additional fees, taxes, and surcharges deposited into the "convention center fund"; terminates allocations of sales and use tax revenue derived from sales within the tourist development zone in which the convention center is located. - Amends TCA Title 7 and Title 67.

1279.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 3 and Title 71, Chapter 6, relative to offenses committed against the elderly.
1279.description: As introduced, expands the offense of aggravated stalking to include a person who commits stalking against a victim who is at least 65 years of age when the person stalking is 15 or more years younger than the victim. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 3 and Title 71, Chapter 6.

1280.last_action: Rec. for pass; ref to Government Operations Committee
1280.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49 and Title 63, relative to incentivizing physicians to provide medical health services in underserved areas.
1280.description: As introduced, establishes a family medicine student loan repayment grant program to incentivize physicians in residency training to provide medical health services in health resource shortage areas following completion of their training. - Amends TCA Title 49 and Title 63.

1281.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1281.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 13; Title 42; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 62; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to services offered through online marketplace providers.
1281.description: As introduced, increases from two years to 30 months the minimum period following the date of receipt that a transportation network must maintain records related to a rider complaint about a driver with whom the rider was matched and who the rider suspects was under the influence of drugs or alcohol during the trip. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 13; Title 42; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 62; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68.

1284.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1284.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12; Title 39; Title 40; Title 47; Title 53; Title 55; Title 57; Title 67; Title 69 and Title 70, relative to forfeiture.
1284.description: As introduced, enacts the "Criminal Forfeiture Process Act"; replaces civil forfeiture with criminal forfeiture process for property seized for forfeiture in connection with criminal offenses. - Amends TCA Title 12; Title 39; Title 40; Title 47; Title 53; Title 55; Title 57; Title 67; Title 69 and Title 70.

1285.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9, Chapter 4, relative to investments.
1285.description: As introduced, authorizes the state treasurer, with the approval of the attorney general and reporter, to contract with additional legal counsel, who must be paid compensation for services as the treasurer may deem just, to advise on issues concerning the state treasurer's fiduciary obligations and responsibilities, including the investment, reinvestment, management, and selection of investment options for program assets. - Amends TCA Title 9, Chapter 4.

1287.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1287.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, relative to subcommittees of the Tennessee historical commission.
1287.description: As introduced, authorizes the commission to establish procedures and rules under which any duty, function, or responsibility of the commission may be carried out by a subcommittee of the commission. - Amends TCA Title 4.

1288.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1288.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 41; Title 53 and Title 70, relative to food.
1288.description: As introduced, extends from 10 to 14 the number of days within which a person can answer or plead to a petition for review of an action of the commissioner of agriculture pursuant to the Tennessee Meat and Poultry Inspection Act, following the date of the filing of a transcript of the proceedings in the cause. - Amends TCA Title 41; Title 53 and Title 70.

1289.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Commerce Committee
1289.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 62, Chapter 3 and Title 62, Chapter 4, relative to professions.
1289.description: As introduced, exempts persons licensed as instructors to teach the practice and theory of aesthetics, manicuring, barbering, or cosmetology from the course requirements necessary to practice as an aesthetician, manicurist, barber, or cosmetologist. - Amends TCA Title 62, Chapter 3 and Title 62, Chapter 4.

1291.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13; Title 43; Title 44 and Title 69, Chapter 3, Part 1, relative to animal feeding operations.
1291.description: As introduced, designates concentrated animal feeding operations, as defined by federal regulations, as an industrial land use for zoning purposes. - Amends TCA Title 13; Title 43; Title 44 and Title 69, Chapter 3, Part 1.

1292.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to sex education.
1292.description: As introduced, authorizes a local education agency to revise its family life curriculum to include instruction on contraceptives, consent, pregnancy, abortion, and certain relationship and communication skills; specifies that an individual or organization does not endorse student nonabstinence as an appropriate or acceptable behavior, or promote gateway sexual activity, in violation of state law by providing such instruction. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

1293.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 49, Chapter 4 and Title 49, Chapter 7, relative to students pursuing teaching as a profession.
1293.description: As introduced, requires TSAC to administer a tuition loan program for students who are not otherwise eligible to receive the in-state tuition rate at a public institution of higher education to receive the in-state tuition rate at the institution at which they are enrolled for up to four academic years with no repayment obligation if the student serves as an educator in a public school in this state for no less than five consecutive years. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 49, Chapter 4 and Title 49, Chapter 7.

1295.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 1, relative to long-acting reversible contraceptives.
1295.description: As introduced, requires the department of health to provide voluntary reversible long-acting contraception to women at no charge. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 1.

1296.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 71, relative to state facilities for the care of children.
1296.description: As introduced, removes an obsolete cross-reference to a statute that was repealed in 2010. - Amends TCA Title 71.

1297.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1297.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 39 and Title 49, relative to state funds.
1297.description: As introduced, clarifies that the notification from the commissioner of finance and administration to the chairs of the finance, ways and means committees of the senate and the house of representatives when it is determined that it is likely that amounts in the revenue fluctuation reserve will be required to be utilized to meet a shortfall of state tax revenue may be provided electronically. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 39 and Title 49.

1298.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1298.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9 and Title 67, relative to economic and community development.
1298.description: As introduced, removes the provision that transferred the duties required of the Tennessee industrial development authority as of June 30, 1981, relative to the outstanding loan guarantees and commitments made by the authority, to the department of economic and community development. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9 and Title 67.

1299.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1299.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 54 and Title 55, relative to transportation.
1299.description: As introduced, requires the department to make the information on its web page accessible for free to any resident in this state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 54 and Title 55.

1300.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1300.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to sexual offenders.
1300.description: As introduced, clarifies that a sexual offender whose victim was a minor may not engage in community service or volunteer work that would cause the offender to be in contact with a minor while required to register with the sexual offender registry. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1301.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1301.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to the transmission of infectious diseases.
1301.description: As introduced, adds a requirement that a licensed medical laboratory reporting an offender's HIV test results to the victim of an assault also provide the victim with a written copy of the test results. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1302.last_action: Assigned to s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee
1302.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, relative to department of children's services data.
1302.description: As introduced, requires the department to collect, maintain, and transmit to the children’s bureau within the United States department of health and human services data required or requested pursuant to federal law for programs focused on children’s welfare; requires the department to aggregate and publish the data on the department’s website. - Amends TCA Title 37.

1303.last_action: Assigned to s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee
1303.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 2-6-201, relative to absentee voting.
1303.description: As introduced, authorizes a person incarcerated in a penal institution to vote by absentee ballot if the person has not been convicted of a felony. - Amends TCA Section 2-6-201.

1304.last_action: Failed in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1304.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 66, relative to landlord obligations.
1304.description: As introduced, requires a landlord, or another person authorized to enter into a rental agreement on the landlord's behalf, to disclose to a residential tenant certain contact information for the agent authorized to manage the premises and an owner of the premises, or a person or agent authorized to act for and on behalf of the owner for the acceptance of service of process and for receipt of notices and demands. - Amends TCA Title 66.

1305.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1305.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 47 and Title 48, relative to services.
1305.description: As introduced, requires an entity that requires on-site payment for services and only accepts payment by quick response code or a credit or debit card machine to accept payment by cash, by check, or through a system that allows the consumer to provide the consumer's credit or debit card information over the phone, or allow the consumer to leave the property without payment at the time, if the quick response code or credit or debit card machine fails to operate correctly to process the payment transaction. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 47 and Title 48.

1306.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 39, relative to handgun safety courses.
1306.description: As introduced, authorizes the department of safety to create a voucher program for the purpose of offsetting the cost of persons taking a handgun safety course for the first time; requires the department to report the number of courses taken using vouchers to the senate judiciary committee and house criminal justice committee. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 39.

1307.last_action: Assigned to s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee
1307.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 10-7-504 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13, relative to a voluntary waiver of firearm rights.
1307.description: As introduced, creates a process for a person to file a voluntary waiver of firearm rights for the purpose of prohibiting the person from purchasing or possessing a firearm; provides for a revocation of the voluntary waiver of firearm rights; creates the offense of selling or transferring a firearm to a person knowing that the person has executed a voluntary waiver of firearm rights that has not been revoked. - Amends TCA Section 10-7-504 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13.

1308.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1308.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, Chapter 7, Part 27, relative to genetic information.
1308.description: As introduced, prohibits a life insurance provider from canceling a life insurance policy based on genetic information, from requesting or requiring genetic testing as a condition of insurability, and from accessing the genetic data of an individual without consent. - Amends TCA Title 56, Chapter 7, Part 27.

1309.last_action: Placed on cal. Commerce Committee for 3/28/2023
1309.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, relative to genetic information.
1309.description: As introduced, enacts the "Genetic Information Privacy Act." - Amends TCA Title 47.

1310.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Government Operations Committee
1310.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to graduate physicians.
1310.description: As introduced, enacts the "Graduate Physicians Act." - Amends TCA Title 49; Title 63 and Title 68.

1311.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Calendar & Rules Committee
1311.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, relative to health care.
1311.description: As introduced, specifies application requirements for an individual licensed as a physician outside the United States or Canada who has completed a residency program or otherwise practiced as a medical professional for at least three of the last five years; requires the board of medical examiners to grant a provisional license to an international medical graduate who qualifies; makes other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 63.

1312.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 68, Chapter 1, relative to health.
1312.description: As introduced, requires the department of health to make its annual report concerning the Tennessee nurse home visitor program to the general assembly by February 1 of each year and in an electronic format. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 68, Chapter 1.

1313.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1313.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 56 and Title 71, relative to insurance.
1313.description: As introduced, authorizes the comptroller to report, in electronic format, the final study, and the oral and written comments, concerning the annual actuarial study of TennCare and participating managed care organizations to the finance, ways and means committees of the senate and the house of representatives, the office of legislative budget analysis, and the fiscal review committee of the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 56 and Title 71.

1314.last_action: Rec. for pass; ref to Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1314.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 10 and Title 71, Chapter 5, relative to weight management.
1314.description: As introduced, permits the services authorized in a collaborative pharmacy practice agreement to include weight management services; requires the bureau of TennCare to make available, or cause to be made available, anti-obesity medication to a recipient if the medication is medically necessary. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 10 and Title 71, Chapter 5.

1316.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Health Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1316.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 63, Chapter 1 and Title 63, Chapter 10, Part 3, relative to the board of pharmacy.
1316.description: As introduced, vacates the board of pharmacy, adds two pharmacy technician members to the board, and makes various other changes to the board's composition; authorizes the board to employ or retain general counsel. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 63, Chapter 1 and Title 63, Chapter 10, Part 3.

1317.last_action: Action def. in Insurance Committee to 3/28/2023
1317.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, Chapter 2, relative to insurance settlement payments.
1317.description: As introduced, requires an insurance company to provide written notice to a claimant at the same time payment of a settlement of a third-party liability claim is made by the insurance company. - Amends TCA Title 56, Chapter 2.

1318.last_action: Placed on cal. State Government Committee for 3/29/2023
1318.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 15; Title 49 and Title 58, relative to the display of flags.
1318.description: As introduced, requires the United States flag and the official state flag to be displayed continuously on property owned, operated, or controlled by this state or a political subdivision of this state, including educational institutions and public school buildings; restricts the display of flags other than the United States flag and the official state flag on said property to only those periods of time for which an entity represented by the flag is meeting or performing an authorized function on the property, with certain exceptions. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 15; Title 49 and Title 58.

1319.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1319.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 44, Chapter 17, relative to criminal offenses.
1319.description: As introduced, creates the Class C misdemeanor of restraining a dog with a chain, cord, tether, cable, or similar device while a disaster is imminent or occurring; states that a person is not subject to prosecution for a violation unless the person has previously received a warning citation for a violation. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 44, Chapter 17.

1320.last_action: Placed on cal. Finance, Ways, and Means Committee for 3/28/2023
1320.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49 and Title 55, relative to the use of global positioning systems while operating school buses.
1320.description: As introduced, allows school bus drivers to use a portable electronic device for navigation of the school bus through use of the device's global positioning system if no hands are used to hold the device or to enter data into the device while the school bus is in motion; the device is mounted on the school bus's windshield, dashboard, or center console area; and the driver views only data related to the navigation of the bus. - Amends TCA Title 49 and Title 55.

1321.last_action: Placed on cal. State Government Committee for 3/29/2023
1321.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 4, Part 6; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5 and Title 55, Chapter 50, Part 2, relative to public records.
1321.description: As introduced, requires the office of open records counsel, in coordination with the department of safety and department of revenue, to develop and maintain a system to track bulk purchases of public records containing personal information from state motor vehicle records and authorized for release to purchasers of such information. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 4, Part 6; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5 and Title 55, Chapter 50, Part 2.

1322.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1322.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 25, relative to the Uniform Motor Vehicle Records Disclosure Act.
1322.description: As introduced, requires the department of revenue to annually report on the administration of the Uniform Motor Vehicle Records Disclosure Act by February 1 of each year to the chair of the senate transportation and safety committee, the chair of the transportation committee of the house of representatives, and the legislative librarian; requires the department of safety and county clerks' offices to assist the department of revenue in compiling the report. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 25.

1324.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63 and Title 68, relative to uterine fibroids.
1324.description: As introduced, requires the department of health to develop a database consisting of information related to uterine fibroids; requires healthcare providers who treat women with uterine fibroids to submit certain demographic and other relevant information to the department for inclusion in the database. - Amends TCA Title 63 and Title 68.

1325.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1325.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 27; Title 29; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55, relative to criminal justice.
1325.description: As introduced, requires the annual written report presented by the director of the TBI and the assistant director of the narcotics investigation division to the criminal justice committee of the house of representatives and the judiciary committee of the senate be presented by February 1 of each year. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 27; Title 29; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55.

1326.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1326.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 16 and Title 3, Chapter 1, Part 1, relative to redistricting.
1326.description: As introduced, requires the comptroller of the treasury to report to the senate judiciary committee and the state government committee of the house of representatives which counties, if any, redrew precinct lines to ensure no split precincts in legislative districts. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 16 and Title 3, Chapter 1, Part 1.

1327.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1327.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Section 3-1-102, relative to state senatorial districts.
1327.description: As introduced, requires the general assembly to post an interactive map showing the boundaries of the districts of the state senate on the general assembly's website. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Section 3-1-102.

1328.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
1328.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 22 and Title 9, relative to financial assistance for Juneteenth celebrations.
1328.description: As introduced, establishes the "Juneteenth Celebration Fund," to be administered by the department of tourist development for the purpose of making grants to local tourism and convention bureaus and nonprofit entities to host Juneteenth celebration festivals in local communities. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 22 and Title 9.

1329.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1329.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 50; Title 61 and Title 67, relative to consumer protection.
1329.description: As introduced, decreases, from three business days to two business days, the amount of time that a consumer reporting agency has after receiving a written or electronic request from a consumer in this state to place a security freeze on the consumer's consumer report. - Amends TCA Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 50; Title 61 and Title 67.

1330.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1330.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 29 and Title 38, relative to law enforcement officers.
1330.description: As introduced, reduces from 60 days to 30 days, the time within which a police officer must return a pay supplement from the time of revocation of a certification due to supplying or acquiescing in false information being supplied to the Tennessee peace officer standards and training commission regarding the officer's eligibility for the certification. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 29 and Title 38.

1332.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to breast cancer.
1332.description: As introduced, creates the commission on African American breast cancer research; requires the commission to study breast cancer issues affecting African American women. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1333.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Higher Education Subcommittee of Education Administration
1333.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8 and Title 49, Chapter 7, relative to tuition discounts.
1333.description: As introduced, extends the 25 percent discount on tuition to any state institution of higher education to children under 24 years of age whose parent is employed full time as an educational assistant in a public school in Tennessee. - Amends TCA Title 8 and Title 49, Chapter 7.

1334.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, relative to privilege taxes.
1334.description: As introduced, increases the period that records related to paying the hotel tax must be retained by the operator from three years to four years. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4.

1335.last_action: Placed on cal. Government Operations Committee for 3/27/2023
1335.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 37 and Title 71, relative to funding child care services.
1335.description: As introduced, enacts the "Workers Need Child Care Act"; establishes the child care infrastructure fund from which the department of economic and community development disperses grants to nonprofit entities for establishing new licensed child care agencies in this state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 37 and Title 71.

1336.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 11, Chapter 3 and Title 68, relative to outdoor recreation.
1336.description: As introduced, creates the office of outdoor recreation to augment services provided by the wildlife resources agency and the department of environment and conservation in leveraging tourism and economic development opportunities to promote outdoor recreation; creates an outdoor recreation advisory board to advise and assist in identifying outdoor recreation opportunities and an outdoor recreation task force to resolve conflicts between trail and water resource users. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 11, Chapter 3 and Title 68.

1338.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 71, relative to the department of human services.
1338.description: As introduced, requires the department to actively seek and apply for federal grants and other available federal funds, and utilize available federal funds, for the purpose of alleviating childhood hunger. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 71.

1339.last_action: Assigned to s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee
1339.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to state executive committees.
1339.description: As introduced, requires a statewide executive committee to fill a vacancy on the committee at the next regularly scheduled meeting of the committee unless the next regular August election precedes such meeting. - Amends TCA Title 2.

1340.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40 and Title 55, Chapter 10, Part 5, relative to drag racing.
1340.description: As introduced, requires a person convicted of drag racing to serve a minimum of 48 consecutive hours in confinement; increases the period of time that the department of safety is required to revoke the driver license of a person convicted of drag racing, from one to two years. - Amends TCA Title 40 and Title 55, Chapter 10, Part 5.

1341.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1341.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 50, relative to economic development.
1341.description: As introduced, in order to be designated as a "broadband ready community" by the department of economic and community development, requires a political subdivision to adopt an ordinance or policy for reviewing applications and issuing permits related to projects relative to broadband services that includes a provision that all applications related to a project will be reviewed and either approved or denied within 20 business days, instead of 30 business days, after the application is submitted. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 50.

1342.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 10; Title 65; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to communications service.
1342.description: As introduced, specifies that the Tennessee public utility commission shall deem an applicant to have satisfied all requirements necessary for approval of a state-issued certificate of franchise authority if the applicant has provided fiber-to-the-premises to at least 1,000 customers for a period of at least one year prior to the application. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 10; Title 65; Title 67 and Title 68.

1343.last_action: Assigned to s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee
1343.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 13; Title 23, Chapter 3; Title 66, Chapter 5, Part 1 and Title 66, Chapter 24, relative to conveyances of real property.
1343.description: As introduced, requires that a deed for the conveyance of real property be prepared and filed by a licensed attorney, title insurance agent, or the owner of the property; requires the county register to verify that an affidavit on a deed of conveyance of real property was duly signed and notarized stating under oath the name and address of the preparer; requires the register to refuse to register any deed of conveyance of real property that is not prepared by a licensed attorney, title insurance agent, or the owner of the real property. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 13; Title 23, Chapter 3; Title 66, Chapter 5, Part 1 and Title 66, Chapter 24.

1345.last_action: Placed on cal. Civil Justice Committee for 3/29/2023
1345.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 66 and Title 68, relative to private property rights.
1345.description: As introduced, prohibits this state and its political subdivisions from adopting or implementing policy recommendations that deliberately or inadvertently infringe or restrict private property rights without due process, as may be required by policy recommendations originating in, or traceable to, "Agenda 21," adopted by the United Nations in 1992 at its Conference on Environment and Development or any other international law or ancillary plan of action that contravenes the constitution of the United States or the constitution of this state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 66 and Title 68.

1346.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1346.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 3 and Title 57, Chapter 4, relative to alcoholic beverages.
1346.description: As introduced, increases from 10 to 15 days the period by which a retail food store wine licensee must give notice to the alcoholic beverage commission after a change in ownership of the licensed premises. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 3 and Title 57, Chapter 4.

1347.last_action: Assigned to s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee
1347.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37 and Title 39, relative to juveniles.
1347.description: As introduced, allows a child to be committed to the custody of the department of children's services if the child is adjudicated delinquent for an offense that would constitute a misdemeanor if committed by an adult and the child has previously been adjudicated delinquent for another listed offense; requires an officer to make efforts to contact a child's parent or guardian when issuing the child a misdemeanor citation in lieu of continued custody, if the officer deems it appropriate. - Amends TCA Title 37 and Title 39.

1348.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1348.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 20, Chapter 1; Title 24, Chapter 5; Title 55, Chapter 12 and Title 56, Chapter 7, relative to civil actions.
1348.description: As introduced, increases from $4,000 to $25,000 the total amount of medical, hospital, and doctor bills that may be itemized with copies and attached as an exhibit to a complaint or civil warrant as prima facie evidence that the bills paid or incurred were necessary and reasonable. - Amends TCA Title 20, Chapter 1; Title 24, Chapter 5; Title 55, Chapter 12 and Title 56, Chapter 7.

1349.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1349.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 16; Title 17 and Title 18, relative to judicial districts.
1349.description: As introduced, requires the speakers of the senate and house of representatives to appoint the members of the advisory task force to review the composition of judicial districts by January 1, 2025, rather than July 1, 2025. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 16; Title 17 and Title 18.

1350.last_action: Placed on cal. Civil Justice Committee for 3/29/2023
1350.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 8 and Title 29, relative to liability for certain acts.
1350.description: As introduced, deletes provision that permits a person who incurs any wrong, injury, loss, damage, or expense resulting from an act or failure to act on the part of a sheriff's deputy, acting by virtue or color of the office, to bring suit against the county in which the sheriff serves; applies to claims accruing on or after July 1, 2023. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 8 and Title 29.

1351.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1351.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 14 and Title 9, Chapter 4, relative to district public defenders.
1351.description: As introduced, changes from 10 days to 10 business days the time period for written notice to members when the president of the district public defenders conference calls a meeting at will. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 14 and Title 9, Chapter 4.

1353.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1353.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 21, Part 10, relative to registers' fees.
1353.description: As introduced, requires the Tennessee advisory commission on intergovernmental relations (TACIR) to study the fees assessed by registers pursuant to present law, including, at a minimum, the amount in fees collected, the amount in fees not collected, the method by which the fees are collected, and a comparison of such fees to similar fees assessed in neighboring states; requires TACIR to report its findings to the chair of the senate judiciary committee, the chair of the civil justice committee of the house of representatives, and the legislative librarian by January 1, 2024. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 21, Part 10.

1354.last_action: Def. to Special Calendar to be Published with Final Calendar in Civil Justice Committee
1354.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 35, relative to foreclosure sales.
1354.description: As introduced, updates requirements regarding public notice for a foreclosure sale of real property, including a requirement that public notice be posted on the secretary of state's website. - Amends TCA Title 35.

1355.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1355.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 39; Title 43; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to medical cannabis.
1355.description: As introduced, changes the deadline for the medical cannabis commission to file its annual report from January 1 to January 15, beginning in 2024. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 39; Title 43; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68.

1356.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 5, Part 7, relative to personal injury sustained by teachers.
1356.description: As introduced, requires an LEA to pay a teacher their full salary, in addition to their full benefits, if the teacher is absent from assigned duties as the result of a personal injury caused by a physical assault or other violent criminal act committed against the teacher in the course of the teacher's employment activities, with certain limitations and exceptions. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 5, Part 7.

1357.last_action: Placed on cal. Health Committee for 3/29/2023
1357.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 14; Title 33; Title 56; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to health care.
1357.description: As introduced, authorizes a healthcare facility to provide a method for an insured, or the insured's personal representative, to acknowledge and sign, by electronic means, a written notice whereby the insured agrees to receive medical services by an out-of-network provider for purposes of the facility collecting out-of-network charges from the insured. - Amends TCA Title 14; Title 33; Title 56; Title 63 and Title 68.

1358.last_action: Rec. for pass; ref to Calendar & Rules Committee
1358.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 40-32-101, relative to expunction of records.
1358.description: As introduced, authorizes the expunction of public records, without cost, of a person who has been charged with a felony or a misdemeanor if the charge is abated by death. - Amends TCA Section 40-32-101.

1359.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1359.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 11, relative to the release of defendants.
1359.description: As introduced, conditions release on own recognizance of persons charged with Class A or B felony on approval of a trial court judge. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 11.

1360.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 67-5-704, relative to property tax relief.
1360.description: As introduced, increases the maximum full market value, from $175,000 to $210,000, of a disabled veteran's residence that is to be used in calculating a reimbursement for property tax paid by the disabled veteran. - Amends TCA Section 67-5-704.

1361.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 39, Chapter 17 and Title 47, relative to sports .
1361.description: As introduced, revises and adds various provisions for purposes of regulating vendors of licensees; revises provisions relating to applications, fees, and penalties; authorizes the sports wagering council to keep certain moneys for administrative purposes; revises provisions relating to recordkeeping and inspections for licensees and registrants. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 39, Chapter 17 and Title 47.

1362.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1362.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to criminal law.
1362.description: As introduced, requires, by February 1 of each year, that the department submit its report regarding the effectiveness of diversion of offenders from state correctional institutions to the criminal justice committee of the house of representatives, judiciary committee of the senate, and fiscal review committee. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55.

1363.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to K-12 education.
1363.description: As introduced, expands who receives the Tennessee Learning Loss Remediation and Student Acceleration Act progress report that is developed by the department to include all of the general assembly, instead of only the speaker of the senate, the speaker of the house of representatives, and the chairs of the education committees of the senate and house of representatives. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 6.

1364.last_action: Placed on cal. State Government Committee for 3/29/2023
1364.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38, Chapter 6; Title 68, Chapter 102 and Title 71, Chapter 3, relative to background checks.
1364.description: As introduced, revises provisions relating to background checks for persons considered for appointment to or employment in various positions in state government and for administrators and employees of child care agencies. - Amends TCA Title 38, Chapter 6; Title 68, Chapter 102 and Title 71, Chapter 3.

1365.last_action: Rec. for pass; ref to Calendar & Rules Committee
1365.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55, relative to criminal law.
1365.description: As introduced, requires the department of safety to include in its written notice of a pending driver license suspension, the reasons for the suspension, which is sent to a person who has failed to pay all litigation taxes, court costs, and fines assessed as a result of disposition of a criminal offense and who has failed to subsequently comply with the payment plan with the clerk of the court. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55.

1366.last_action: Rec. for pass; ref to Calendar & Rules Committee
1366.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 20 and Title 33, relative to opioids.
1366.description: As introduced, adds additional companies to the statewide opioid settlement agreement for which the attorney general and reporter has the authority to release pending or future claims. - Amends TCA Title 20 and Title 33.

1367.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1367.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to educator licensure.
1367.description: As introduced, adds the education instruction committee of the house of representatives to the list of committees of the general assembly to which the department is required to submit a report regarding the number of endorsement exemptions and temporary permits requested and issued for each of the 2021-2022, 2022-2023, and 2023-2024 school years. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1368.last_action: Assigned to s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee
1368.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36 and Title 71, relative to children.
1368.description: As introduced, requires a party who files a divorce complaint to also simultaneously file information regarding whether parties have health insurance coverage in employer-based health coverage and whether such coverage is provided for any children of the marriage; makes mandatory the provision of sworn statements regarding parties' income, expenses, real and personal property, and whether parties have health insurance coverage in employer-based health coverage and whether such coverage is provided for any children of the marriage. - Amends TCA Title 36 and Title 71.

1369.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
1369.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 48, Chapter 101 and Title 58, relative to donations for disaster relief.
1369.description: As introduced, requires charitable organizations that solicit and receive contributions for charitable purposes related to a declared disaster in this state to expend or distribute the funds for that purpose within 24 months of the date the disaster is first declared; requires unused funds to be transferred to a fund managed by the director of TEMA to be used for the purpose of disaster relief activities in this state. - Amends TCA Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 48, Chapter 101 and Title 58.

1370.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Government Operations Committee
1370.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 68, Chapter 204, relative to the state energy policy council.
1370.description: As introduced, extends the sunset termination date for the state energy policy council from June 30, 2024, to June 30, 2025. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 68, Chapter 204.

1371.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 4-1-412 and Title 54, relative to the renaming of certain roads and streets.
1371.description: As introduced, renames the portion of the road known as "Rep. John Lewis Way" in Davidson County located between Dr. Martin L. King Jr. Blvd and James Robertson Parkway as "President Donald Trump Boulevard"; requires the alteration of governmental addresses; and removes protections for named streets from the Tennessee Heritage Protection Act of 2016. - Amends TCA Section 4-1-412 and Title 54.

1372.last_action: Placed on cal. State Government Committee for 3/29/2023
1372.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 50, relative to employment.
1372.description: As introduced, increases from 12 to 24 hours the period a former employee has to withdraw from the premises of the former employer's premises after a separation from employment. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 50.

1373.last_action: H. Placed on Regular Calendar for 3/30/2023
1373.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 13, Part 1, relative to criminal injuries compensation.
1373.description: As introduced, specifies that a person making a false claim for payment under the Criminal Injuries Compensation Act of 1976 may be liable under the False Claims Act, compiled in title 4, chapter 18, part 1. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 13, Part 1.

1374.last_action: Rec. for pass; ref to Government Operations Committee
1374.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, relative to the Tennessee historical commission.
1374.description: As introduced, vacates the commission and reconstitutes the commission; changes the size and appointing authorities for the commission from 24 gubernatorial appointees to 20 total members with five each being appointed by the governor, the speaker of the senate, and the speaker of the house of representatives and five ex officio non-voting members. - Amends TCA Title 4.

1375.last_action: Placed on cal. Government Operations Committee for 3/27/2023
1375.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 7 and Title 49, Chapter 8, relative to higher education.
1375.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Higher Education Freedom of Expression and Transparency Act." - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 7 and Title 49, Chapter 8.

1376.last_action: Placed on cal. Education Administration for 3/29/2023
1376.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-6-1019, relative to prohibited concepts.
1376.description: As introduced, creates a process by which certain individuals may file a complaint with an LEA or public charter school for the LEA's or public charter school's including or promoting certain prohibited concepts as part of a course of instruction, in a curriculum or instructional program, or by allowing teachers or other employees to use supplemental materials that include or promote certain prohibited concepts. - Amends TCA Section 49-6-1019.

1377.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 9; Title 14; Title 33; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to health.
1377.description: As introduced, enacts the “Youth Health Protection Act.” - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 9; Title 14; Title 33; Title 63 and Title 68.

1378.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Health Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1378.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 11; Title 49; Title 68 and Title 70, relative to camps.
1378.description: As introduced, requires the department to publish the annual permit fee schedule to operate an organized camp on the department's website. - Amends TCA Title 11; Title 49; Title 68 and Title 70.

1379.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Health Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1379.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 14; Title 53; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to prohibiting minor consent to vaccination.
1379.description: As introduced, enacts the "Mature Minor Doctrine Clarification Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 14; Title 53; Title 63 and Title 68.

1380.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
1380.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to third-grade students.
1380.description: As introduced, authorizes a third-grade student who is not proficient in English language arts (ELA) to be promoted to fourth grade if at least 66 percent of the third-grade students in the student's LEA or public charter school test proficient on the ELA portion of the most recently administered Tennessee comprehensive assessment program test and if the student's parent or guardian, teacher, and school principal mutually agree and recommend in writing that the student should be promoted to fourth grade. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 6.

1381.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7; Title 8 and Title 58, Chapter 2, relative to emergency first responders.
1381.description: As introduced, adds public safety dispatchers to those first responders eligible to receive certain benefits when killed in the line of duty. - Amends TCA Title 7; Title 8 and Title 58, Chapter 2.

1382.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1382.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to prostitution.
1382.description: As introduced, prohibits the arrest, charge, or prosecution of a person for prostitution if the evidence for the arrest, charge, or prosecution results solely from the person's report of the criminal act; increases the penalty for patronizing prostitution from a Class A misdemeanor to a Class E felony. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

1383.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1383.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to aggravated prostitution.
1383.description: As introduced, deletes the criminal offense of aggravated prostitution and permits a person to have a prior conviction for aggravated prostitution that was the result of the person's status as a human trafficking victim expunged if the person meets certain conditions. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1384.last_action: Placed on s/c cal Criminal Justice Subcommittee for 3/28/2023
1384.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13, relative to weapons.
1384.description: As introduced, defines "intent to go armed," for purposes of the criminal offenses of unlawful carrying of a weapon, carrying weapons on school property, and carrying weapons in public parks or other recreational grounds, as carrying or wearing a weapon with premeditation and forethought to commit an infamous crime. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13.

1385.last_action: Assigned to s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee
1385.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 10; Title 16; Title 36; Title 39; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to marriage.
1385.description: As introduced, enacts the "Marital Contract at Common Law Recording Act"; authorizes county clerks to accept and record a record of common law marriage between one man and one woman; limits the jurisdiction of circuit courts and chancery courts in cases involving the definition of common law marriage to the principles of common law marriage. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 10; Title 16; Title 36; Title 39; Title 67 and Title 68.

1386.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 17, relative to nonprofit gaming.
1386.description: As introduced, allows a 501(c)(3) foundation connected to a chamber of commerce that has been in continuous and active existence in this state for at least 10 successive years in the county to hold an annual event. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 17.

1387.last_action: Placed on cal. Government Operations Committee for 3/27/2023
1387.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 63, Chapter 6, relative to radiologic imaging and radiation therapy.
